programme.title: Wildlife Diaries Australia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Of Koalas and Drones
programme.desc: Lone Pine Koala Sanctuary was opened in 1927 at a time when Koalas were still being killed on a large scale for the fur trade. Today, hardly anything threatens the natural habitats of these animals as much as the desertification of the forests. We let the drones fly and are there when a new tree is planted.

programme.title: Antarctica - Tales from the End of the World
programme.desc: The Antarctic region is undoubtedly one of the most remote and inhospitable, yet one of the most beautiful landscapes of the world. This documentary takes us on a journey to the stormy isolated islands of the Southern Ocean. Seals, penguins, seabirds and numerous other animals live and breed in this hostile environment and harsh climate. Only by an icebreaker can we reach the remote coasts of the Antarctic continent where Emperor Penguins defy the life-threatening environment of the vast ice desert at the end of the world.

programme.title: Wildlife Diaries Australia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Of Flying Foxes and Heat Waves
programme.desc: While the Tolga Bat Hospital is looking after endangered flying foxes, researchers are using thermographic cameras to search for flying foxes and koalas. But they can also detect bush and wildfire more quickly.

programme.title: Wildlife Diaries Australia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Of Sea Turtles and Coral Reefs
programme.desc: The Cairns Turtle Rehabilitation Center (CTRC) raises and cares for sick, or injured turtles, while the Schmidt Ocean Institute goes on a diving mission with a high-tech underwater rover. In this way, we learn firsthand about the state of Australias sensitive marine animals natural habitat and what needs to be done to ensure their survival.

programme.title: Wildlife Diaries Australia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Of Wombats and Vaccines
programme.desc: Tasmanias Bonorong Wildlife Sanctuary used to be a traditional wildlife park - now it is an innovative and active wildlife sanctuary and home to the famous Tasmanian Devil, to wombats, and many other native species. But unfortunately, "Tassie Devils" are particularly endangered by the Devil Facial Tumor Disease (DFTD). We accompany the team of young, ambitious scientists on their fight against the disease.

programme.title: Wildlife Diaries Australia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Of Koalas and Drones
programme.desc: Lone Pine Koala Sanctuary was opened in 1927 at a time when Koalas were still being killed on a large scale for the fur trade. Today, hardly anything threatens the natural habitats of these animals as much as the desertification of the forests. We let the drones fly and are there when a new tree is planted.

programme.title: Wildlife Diaries Australia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 wOf Kangaroos and Conservation
programme.desc: Visiting the fenced nature reserve Arid Recovery in southern Australia, we witness the care of an injured kangaroo and follow researchers at the Hidden Vale Wildlife Centre near Brisbane as they train native animals to detect tracks of threatening predators and then move to safety.

programme.title: Wildlife Diaries Australia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Of Fairy Penguins and GPS Trackers
programme.desc: Australias largest fur seal colony is located on Phillip Island. Night after night, a breathtaking spectacle takes place here: At sunset, countless fairy penguins return from their hunt for fish. In the station near the penguin colony, pioneering scientific research is conducted around the cute animals. We learn how dedicated scientists are trying to secure the future of the fairy penguins with the help of GPS trackers.

programme.title: Beak and Brain - Genius Birds from Down Under
programme.desc: These child prodigies of the animal kingdom have feathers and beaks – and very special skills! The Keas of New Zealand are the only parrots that live in snowy mountain areas. They like testing their brains, solving puzzles and challenging tourists: they unscrew bottle-tops, dismantle windscreen wiper blades and tear open rucksacks. They seem so determined you’d think they have an understanding of physics and mechanics! Thousands of miles northwards, in New Caledonia, other birds have talent, too. Here bird expert Gavin Hunt discovered that crows are able to produce a whole set of tools, each designed for a particular purpose – the most intricate tool culture in the animal kingdom! These...

programme.title: Symphony of the Seas - Underwater Wonders of Australias Ocean
programme.desc: Our journeys take us all around the world from Patagonia to the USA, from Greenland to South Africa and from Cambodia to Australia and leads us to the most fascinating places where landscapes animals and humans are the main focus of our documentaries. Whether on land or at sea – the last paradises of the world are our destination.

programme.title: Wild Moments
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Wild Moments: Dangerous and Deadly I
programme.desc: Wildlife film-makers often risk life and limb trying to capture unique images of their dangerous protagonists. In Alaska a cunning grizzly threatens the son of Andreas Kieling, on the remote Wrangel Island in northern-east Siberia his colleague Uwe Anders is taken by surprise by a a polar bear, and off the coast of South Africa a diving-team is unexpectedly surrounded by white sharks. But the life of the film-makers is also threatened by elemental forces, life-threatening diseases and failing technical equipment: Deep in the vast rainforests of West Africa cameraman Klaus Scheurich nearly dies of malaria, and in South India a film team narrowly escapes death in a hot-air balloon accident....

programme.title: Wild Moments
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Wild Moments: Dangerous and Deadly II
programme.desc: Wildlife filmmakers often risk life and limb trying to capture unique images of their dangerous protagonists. A cunning grizzly grabs a salmon off Andreas Kielings fishing rod, in the depths of the Amazon River a diving team has a spooky encounter with piranhas, in the Mediterranean Sea the currents nearly push Thomas Behrend into the mouths of angry sperm whales defending a newborn - and cameramen who want to film jaguars in the dense jungle of South America become easy prey for the well camouflaged cats. The life of the film-makers is also threatened by elemental forces and failing technical equipment: In the swamps of North Australia violent storms hold up the crossing of tearing...

programme.title: Wild Moments
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Wild Moments: Dangerous and Deadly III
programme.desc: Wildlife filmmakers often risk life and limb trying to capture unique images of their dangerous protagonists. In the Kruger National Park Josef Jozefowicz steps into a lionesses den to film her cubs, in Alaska Andreas Kieling mingles with giant elk bulls in order to film them in action, and in Florida his colleague Zoltan Torok gets very close to an alligator mother guarding its nest. The life of the film-makers is also threatened by elemental forces, and failing technical equipment: the strong and tearing current of the Yukon River throws Andreas Kielings boat onto a gravel bank, in the Democratic Republik of Congo camerawoman Heike Grebe is separated from her colleagues in the dense...

programme.title: Penguin City - South Georgia
programme.desc: In the middle of the Antarctic Ocean, an entire mountain range arises from the water: South Georgia, the nursery of the Antarctic. Hundreds of thousands of penguins, elephant seals, fur seals and their young overcrowd the beaches. The rough weather and the extremely difficult access to the island cause filmmaking to be an endeavor requiring much of the film crew around Roland Gockel and Rosie Koch and the state of the art cameras. A lot of patience and sensitivity over a period spanning some five years now offers unknown and poignant insights into the life of the King Penguins on South Georgia Island

programme.title: Project Antarctica
programme.desc: Why dont you do something sensible? - Tim, Michael and Dennis have heard this sentence more than once since their school days when they professed their dream jobs: Artist, photographer, filmmaker. And they went on to say that some dreams had to remain dreams, that work didnt have to be fun, but above all that it had to pay enough and be safe. A few years later, the three are working on their joint feature film. They put all their eggs in one basket and are determined to invest two years of working time to achieve their goal. Unpaid. Its not just any goal: the three want to travel to Antarctica. They want to find out whether it is possible to reach even the most distant destinations if...

programme.title: Antarctica - Tales from the End of the World
programme.desc: The Antarctic region is undoubtedly one of the most remote and inhospitable, yet one of the most beautiful landscapes of the world. This documentary takes us on a journey to the stormy isolated islands of the Southern Ocean. Seals, penguins, seabirds and numerous other animals live and breed in this hostile environment and harsh climate. Only by an icebreaker can we reach the remote coasts of the Antarctic continent where Emperor Penguins defy the life-threatening environment of the vast ice desert at the end of the world.

programme.title: Wildlife Diaries Australia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Of Flying Foxes and Heat Waves
programme.desc: While the Tolga Bat Hospital is looking after endangered flying foxes, researchers are using thermographic cameras to search for flying foxes and koalas. But they can also detect bush and wildfire more quickly.

programme.title: Wildlife Diaries Australia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Of Sea Turtles and Coral Reefs
programme.desc: The Cairns Turtle Rehabilitation Center (CTRC) raises and cares for sick, or injured turtles, while the Schmidt Ocean Institute goes on a diving mission with a high-tech underwater rover. In this way, we learn firsthand about the state of Australias sensitive marine animals natural habitat and what needs to be done to ensure their survival.

programme.title: Wildlife Diaries Australia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Of Wombats and Vaccines
programme.desc: Tasmanias Bonorong Wildlife Sanctuary used to be a traditional wildlife park - now it is an innovative and active wildlife sanctuary and home to the famous Tasmanian Devil, to wombats, and many other native species. programme.title: North Macedonia: Between Traditional Dances and Mini Navy
programme.desc: Northern Macedonia emerged from being a once constituent republic of the former Yugoslavia. Anyone wishing to discover unknown worlds has every chance of finding them in this young Balkan country, full of imposing mountains, lakes of crystal-clear water, original villages and centuries-old customs. Nevertheless, Northern Macedonia, which borders Serbia in the north and Greece in the south, considered to be one of the poorest countries in Europe.

programme.title: mareTV: The Blue and White Island World of Greece: Mykonos, Naxos and Tinos
programme.desc: Around the once sacred Isle of Delos, some 200 islands, including 20 larger ones, are arranged almost in a circle. This is where the name of the Greek island paradise comes from: Cyclades, a derivation of the Greek word kýklos, circle. Each cyclade has a unique character. The pelican Petros, about 20 years old, is the mascot of Mykonos. He moves from taverna to taverna all day long, scrounging fish. This works out sometimes well and sometimes not so well. Petros does have a few human friends who regularly slip him something, but all too often visitors eager to take pictures block his path. Then he has to "wiggle" his way through the crowd. Jackie Onassis is said to have once brought...

programme.title: The Green Heart of Croatia - At the Banks of River Sava
programme.desc: Every year, in the middle of Croatia, its the same story: after the annual snowmelt, a huge flood wave spills out of the Alps toward Zagreb and Belgrade. This leads to an increase in the River Savas water levels of some ten metres. The contents of more than ten billion bathtubs floods an area the size of Lake Constance, often for months on end, yet still the Croatian and Serbian capital is spared a flood disaster. One of the reasons for this is the fact that the Sava is able to flow unhindered. The annual floods not only create a natural retention reservoir for flood control: alongside the Sava lies a natural paradise, unique in Central Europe. In the species-rich, alluvial flood...

programme.title: Fertile Floods - Croatias Wetlands
programme.desc: Every year, in the middle of Croatia, its the same story: after the annual snowmelt, a huge flood wave spills out of the Alps toward Zagreb and Belgrade. This leads to an increase in the River Savas water levels of some ten metres. The contents of more than ten billion bathtubs floods an area the size of Lake Constance, often for months on end, yet still the Croatian and Serbian capital is spared a flood disaster. One of the reasons for this is the fact that the Sava is able to flow unhindered. The annual floods not only create a natural retention reservoir for flood control: alongside the Sava lies a natural paradise, unique in Central Europe. In the species-rich, alluvial flood...

programme.title: Dream Islands Of Europe: Capri, Ischia and Procida
programme.desc: Capri and Ischia are world famous. From Naples, its just a short hop over to the two islands. Perfect destinations, then, for a weeks cruise along the Gulf of Naples and the adjoining Amalfi Coast to the south. There, Positano, Amalfi or Salerno as well as a handful of other mostly small harbor towns are extremely worthwhile destinations.

programme.title: mareTV: Venice - Lagoon and Legend
programme.desc: Venice has been attracting people as if by magic for centuries. The Italians call her La Serenissima, or the sublime. Perched on wooden posts, she braves the elements and the huge, annual surge of visitors. Vogalonga is the name of a Venetian sports competition for women, in which the participants row their boats standing. This is a tradition that Guilia and Elena also follow. They train hard, as the yearly regatta is soon to begin. Anyone caught driving their water vehicle with more than 7 km/h through the canals of Venice, risks getting a ticket from local policewoman Lorenza Mariutti. The reason: the resulting waves gnaw at the foundations of the grand palaces. Venetians are very...

programme.title: Italy My Love
programme.desc: In ten coastal areas of Italy, we encounter people that have a very special relationship with their region. All of them love their country, their traditions and their work. We met with enthusiasts and hedonists that permitted us to take a glimpse into their everyday lives. Young Italians, who have rediscovered nature and its treasures. Others, that preserve the beauty, archaeologists that apply whole new methods, farmers that only cultivate that which the soil needs. Fishermen, who fish in the same way as it was done a century ago and tough, young men who play and dance the Tarantella. Dolphins, giant sea turtles and pink flamingos, which are researched, nursed back to health or simply...

programme.title: Wild Sardinia
programme.desc: Sardinia has always been the epitome of pure wilderness, an emerald of volcanic origin in the Mediterranean. 1900 metres of coastline and an infinite maze of offshore islands. But Sardinia also has other facets: green valleys, rugged mountains, murmuring brooks, mysterious ruins and a unique fauna. Just off of Sardinias coast is an untouched underwater paradise - uniquely beautiful, but also dangerous. Pilot whales, dolphins and mobula rays populate the waters at Capo Testa in the north of the island. In the west, the lagoons of Cabras represent a wild landscape of lakes in which thousands of flamingos live and hunt the red brine shrimps. In addition to the flamingos, grey and purple...

programme.title: Wild Switzerland
programme.desc: Gentle, green meadows, rugged rock faces, mysterious lakes, dense forests, tall mountains, low-lying river deltas, quietly meandering mountain streams and smack dab in the middle, a unique fauna - THIS is Switzerland! We trace the elementary power of nature and present animals and plants in landscapes that have hardly ever been touched by mankind. Switzerland is an alpine country, but it is also Europes surge tank. Rivers such as the Rhine and the Rhone have their sources here. Glaciers, crevasses, icy cold caves and the underwater dome of the Verzasca are the unusual settings we chose for this film. We meet with rare, selected animal species and present their behavioural patterns, such...

programme.title: Wild Skagerrak
programme.desc: The strait that connects the North Sea with the Baltic, with depths of over 700 metres, is notorious for its dangerously strong currents. But currents also mean food and therefore nourishment for the large swarms of fish that inhabit the region. The sea grass meadows are comparable with those off the Californian coast. Harbour seals, grey seals and orcas hunt here, as do the rare black mouth cat shark and porpoises. Close by, catfish mate, which in itself is quite spectacular and never caught on film in this way before. Lions mane jellyfish with nettle threads of up to 30 metres in length make their way through the open sea. Skagerraks coastal regions are amongst the most beautiful and...

programme.title: Europes Wild River - The Elbe - 1.000 Miles of Wildlife and Nature
programme.desc: The river rises in the Czech Giant Mountains. Here it is called the Labe. After Děčín it flows into Germany and is called Elbe. There are various explanations for the origin of the river name "Elbe". One often mentioned is the Latin name of the river "albia", which means "bright water". This would also explain why the stream is referred to with the feminine article "the Elbe", since the Latin term "albia" is also feminine. Rather poetic than linguistically probable, however, is the explanation that elves (Middle High German: alb) scurrying around the pines in the white river mists could have helped the river to get its name. Geographically, the river can be divided into different...

programme.title: The Sudheide - Woods, meadows, open country
programme.desc: Forests and fields, moors and heathland, shepherds and sheep - these are the symbols of an ostensibly unspoilt landscape that has inspired poets and painters alike for centuries. The secret of the almost 500 km² nature reserve Naturpark Sudheide lies in its diversity: the origins of its soil, geology and topography can be traced back to the ice age. But the region between Hamburg and Hannover is anything but unspoilt. For centuries, it was synonymous with heathland farmers and formed as a North German cultivated landscape. This documentary tells of an almost unknown region, which has been strongly influenced by mankind for centuries, yet still remains diverse in its nature. Nature...

programme.title: Wild Alpine Rivers - Life in the Extreme
programme.desc: What would happen to the mountains without water? They would turn into deserts, devoid of life and vegetation. But there are very few mountains without water on our planet. They take care of this themselves, creating their life’s element and taking water directly from the sky by entrapping the clouds around them. This water then collects on the flanks of the mountains, where it turns from rivulets into rivers, that flow out into the oceans. Mountains and water are symbiotic, a cycle that keeps life on earth going. Mountain streams slowly move along meadows before, only moments later, turning into the spray of waterfalls or small mystic lakes. What kind of life can be found in and around...

programme.title: Chiemgau, A Changing Landscape
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Chiemgau, A Changing Landscape: Episode 1
programme.desc: A few thousand years ago, there were bare moraine ridges and barren meltwater valleys here. A landscape born in the last ice age, characterized by the edge of the Alps, gentle hills, moors, and lakes. And by cultural richness, not only on the islands in Lake Chiemsee, with their famous monasteries and castles. Long before King Ludwig II, the first people settled in the Chiemgau region. Finds of hunting weapons from the Neanderthal era prove that the land was inhabited even during the ice age, probably because there was plenty of game to hunt. During the Bronze Age, one of the most important trade routes from the mountains to the Alpine foothills passed through here. Then came the Celts...

programme.title: Chiemgau, A Changing Landscape
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Chiemgau, A Changing Landscape: Episode 2
programme.desc: Three times in the past two decades, the Chiemsee area has experienced "once-in-a-century" floods. Climate, wildlife, and landscape have changed, and it seems this transformation is accelerating. Species living in the flood zones are developing sophisticated survival strategies. Knot ants, for instance, place their queen in the middle and form a raft with their bodies, even conquering new habitats. Flooding is less of a disaster for nature and impacts humans more significantly.

programme.title: Moksgmol - The Quest for the Spirit Bear
programme.desc: A forest that lives off fish, a white bear that is not a polar bear, and wolves that feed off the ocean… Canada’s Great Bear Rain Forest is a strange and pristine world, a land that time almost forgot. The awe-inspiring northern coastline of British Columbia with its great fjords that rival those in Norway, is the habitat of numerous species and the scene for the amazing co-existence of wolves, ravens, salmon, bears and a mystical rainforest, whose lives are intricately intertwined…

programme.title: Bear Essentials
programme.desc: We follow three young bears of different species – polar bears, brown bears and sloth bears (like Baloo, the Jungle Book Bear) – that inhabit dramatically varied landscapes as they find their way in the world. We look at how their mothers teach them the skills they need to survive and watch the many dangers they face. Their young lives are full of learning, moments of great tenderness and life-threatening drama. Over three years all of our bears, despite hardships and losses along the way, prove they have what it takes, they all have learned their bear essentials.

programme.title: Africanews
programme.desc: Africanews is the only independent national and international news channel from an African perspective. It reports breaking news from the continent, delivers unbiased reporting and is available on TV and digital platforms.

programme.title: OJ25
programme.desc: Detective Mark Fuhrman is called to account for an audiotape of him using the N-word and when the jury hears the tape Fuhrman takes the fifth rather than explain himself.

programme.title: OJ25
programme.desc: The prosecution, fresh from the debacle of O.J. Simpson trying - and failing - to put on the bloody glove, wont give up. They make one last ditch effort to show the gloves worn by the killer belonged to the defendant.

programme.title: Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.desc: Nancy Seaman doesnt denied killing her husband Robert with a hatchet; either she planned it or the murder was a desperate attempt to save her own life after, what she claims, was three decades of physical and emotional abuse.

programme.title: Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.desc: Years after being found not guilty of the murders of Nicole Brown Simpson and Ron Goldman, O.J. Simpson was back in a courtroom and again facing felony charges.

programme.title: 72 Hours: True Crime
programme.desc: A frat boy lures a girl to his house with the promise of a party, but once there it turns out he has ulterior motives.

programme.title: 72 Hours: True Crime
programme.desc: Three teenagers accompany a deliveryman to a densely wooded area for a drinking party that, before long, becomes a nightmare.

programme.title: 72 Hours: True Crime
programme.desc: A young Orthodox Jewish man is in Pittsburgh to celebrate Passover with family when he is gunned down simply because of the way he is dressed.

programme.title: 72 Hours: True Crime
programme.desc: Police believe the man who robbed an armored car at gunpoint is responsible for a series of robberies.

programme.title: 72 Hours: True Crime
programme.desc: An Ethiopian womans husband is distraught when she is found strangled; something about him is strangely suspicious.

programme.title: OJ25
programme.desc: Closing arguments begin. But not before two of the more remarkable moments in this remarkable case. Two Mafia hitmen - in the federal witness protection program testify - on behalf of O.J. Simpson.

programme.title: OJ25
programme.desc: The verdict comes back with lightning speed. Some are shocked. Some overjoyed. But why did it turn out the way that it did? We take you inside the jury room and show you.

programme.title: Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.desc: Ten years after being found guilty of the murder of her husband, Susie Mowbrays conviction was overturned, and she would once again face a jury of her peers.

programme.title: Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.desc: While under the influence of drugs and alcohol, Chante Mallard struck pedestrian Gregory Biggs with her car, impaling him in the windshield.

programme.title: Someone They Knew... With Tamron Hall
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Someone They Knew... With Tamron Hall
programme.desc: Small-town plumber John Cataneo fixed other peoples homes for a living, until death came knocking on his front door.

programme.title: Someone They Knew... With Tamron Hall
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Someone They Knew... With Tamron Hall
programme.desc: When a well-respected psychiatrist and his adult son are killed as they sleep, police are baffled by the apparent randomness-until an arrest in an unrelated crime leads them to the least likely of suspects.

programme.title: Notorious Criminals
programme.desc: Patty Hearst, a young heiress from one of Americas richest and most politically connected families, kidnapped by a mysterious underground militia.

programme.title: US Bounty Hunters
programme.desc: This guy may have thought the bondsman rescheduled his court date...But he still has to go with the Bounty Hunters.

programme.title: US Bounty Hunters
programme.desc: This guy makes eye contact with Bounty Hunters just as they drove up and started running, but not fast enough for the Bounty Hunters. Fred snatches him in the back yard.

programme.title: Accomplice to Murder With Vinnie Politan
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Accomplice to Murder With Vinnie Politan
programme.desc: The Winn Dixie Murder. When Sherri Malarik was found dead in a Winn Dixie parking lot, police suspected her husband Greg was involved.

programme.title: Accomplice to Murder With Vinnie Politan
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Accomplice to Murder With Vinnie Politan
programme.desc: After dentist Norman Larzelere is shot by a masked man and dies in the arms of his hysterical wife Virginia, police initially suspect a robbery gone wrong.

programme.title: 72 Hours: True Crime
programme.desc: A small town public school teacher fails to arrive for work for the first time in thirty years, leaving an empty house and a baffled community.

programme.title: 72 Hours: True Crime
programme.desc: When the curiosity of an insurance claims investigator is piqued by the suspicious circumstances surrounding the death of a young Sikh man.

programme.title: 72 Hours: True Crime
programme.desc: A trucker discovers the body of an East Indian woman in the woods; the autopsy reveals that she has an unusually high level of sedatives in her blood and she has been strangled.

programme.title: 72 Hours: True Crime
programme.desc: Surgically clean body parts start turning up on a highway.

Youre watching ""Ready, the Fire Trucks Day"", an educational and interactive Super Rescue Team series prepared to you by Pinkfong!"

programme.title: If Looks Could Kill
programme.desc: Mitch falls for a beautiful woman who turns out to be a cold-blooded murderer and con artist.

programme.title: Reunion
programme.desc: Mitch and his ex-wife Gayle reconnect at their high school reunion with unforeseen results.

programme.title: Now Sit Right Back and Youll Hear a Tale
programme.desc: Eddie slips on sand and hits his head. When he regains consciousness, he is on Gilligan’s Island.

programme.title: War of Nerves
programme.desc: Drug lord Mason Sato is released from prison and determined to seek revenge Mitch Buchannon.

programme.title: Big Monday
programme.desc: Reports of a coming storm and enormous waves bring painful memories for Mitch.

programme.title: Sea of Flames
programme.desc: A drifter torches Eddies lifeguard tower which leads the team to discover an illegal drug lab.

programme.title: The Chamber
programme.desc: Mitch has an out-of-body experience when he attempts to save a trapped diver without scuba gear.

programme.title: Sharks Cove
programme.desc: Shauni is suspicious when a swimmer training for the Olympics disappears in "Sharks Cove.”

programme.title: The Lost Treasure of Tower 12
programme.desc: A poet flirts with Shauni, and with danger, when he accidently gets involved with two jewel thieves.

programme.title: The Big Spill
programme.desc: Mitch helps Lane Brody, investigate a corporation suspected of dumping deadly chemicals in the bay.

programme.title: Game of Chance
programme.desc: Harvey and Mitch go to play poker on an offshore yacht where they are robbed by a masked man.

programme.title: Summer of 85
programme.desc: Shauni and Eddie visit a fortune teller who predicts that Eddie will soon meet his first true love.

programme.title: River of No Return, Part 1
programme.desc: A mysterious death finds Mitch, Hobie, Eddie, and Shauni travelling to Californias gold country.

programme.title: River of No Return, Part 2
programme.desc: A whitewater rafting vacation turns deadly by murderous miners in Californias gold country.

programme.title: Tequila Bay
programme.desc: Slade and Brody tangle with a violent surf gang while Mitchs life is thrown into turmoil.

programme.title: Rookie of the Year
programme.desc: Summer and Matt face challenges in Rookie School and CJ and Steph are forced to share an apartment.

programme.title: Pier Pressure
programme.desc: Hobie and Summer find themselves torn between doing the right thing and giving into social pressure.

programme.title: Showdown at Malibu Beach High
programme.desc: Malibu Beach High students square off against the schools plans to sell sacred Chumash Indian lands.

programme.title: Point Doom
programme.desc: Matt has an affair with a motorcycle racer and Mitch and Stephanie compete in a battle of the sexes.

programme.title: Princess of Tides
programme.desc: Mitch falls for a beautiful woman he doesnt know is both a princess and an assassination target.

programme.title: Masquerade
programme.desc: Mitch and Stephanie board a yacht in disguise to capture a group of modern-day pirates.

programme.title: Lifeguards Cant Jump
programme.desc: Mitch and Garner go undercover as a street basketball team to solve a young athletes murder.

programme.title: Dead of Summer
programme.desc: An assassination plot finds CJ on an explosive Scarab heading for a concert and political rally.

programme.title: A Matter of Life and Death
programme.desc: Mitch has a dispute with his father about his career choice, but his father is hiding a sad secret.

programme.title: Island of Romance
programme.desc: CJ and Stephanie travel to Catalina Island for a "girls-only” weekend getaway, only to find love.

programme.title: Strangers Among Us
programme.desc: Mitch and Stephanie cope with UFO enthusiasts on the beach waiting for an extra-terrestrial visit.

programme.title: Vacation, Part 1
programme.desc: The Baywatch lifeguards set sail on a romantic cruise, only to encounter a dangerous fugitive.

programme.title: Vacation, Part 2
programme.desc: The lifeguards encounter high seas hijackers who leave Mitch and Stephanie stranded in the Pacific.

programme.title: The Tower
programme.desc: An escaped psychopath takes Summer and Stephanie hostage in a lifeguard tower.

programme.title: Stakeout at Surfrider Beach
programme.desc: Mitch finds himself falling for an Italian actress who is being stalked by ruthless robbers.

programme.title: Shattered, Part 1
programme.desc: Mitch is paralyzed when he saves three teenagers. Can the team rally to repair his shattered life?

programme.title: Shattered, Part 2
programme.desc: Mitch undergoes a rehabilitation regimen and helps a 10-year-old paraplegic pursued by a hit man.

programme.title: Kicks
programme.desc: Mitch coaches Matt in an amateur kickboxing tournament, but the competition turns deadly.

programme.title: Fatal Exchange
programme.desc: Mitch contends with an Australian lifeguard and rekindles his love affair with Kaye Morgan.

programme.title: Race Against Time, Part 1
programme.desc: Mitchs ex-wife flies in for a weekend visit and informs Mitch she is taking Hobie to Ohio.

programme.title: Race Against Time, Part 2
programme.desc: A dramatic plane crash finds Hobie and his mother trapped in a rapidly flooding fuselage.

programme.title: Lovers Cove
programme.desc: Romance is in the air at Baywatch as Mitch and Jackies friendship grows more intense.

programme.title: Blindside
programme.desc: John Cort returns to Baywatch where his life undergoes a devastating change.

programme.title: Skyrider
programme.desc: Summer has love problems when Slade returns to discover Matt and Summer are dating.

programme.title: Tentacles, Part 1
programme.desc: A prison break gone awry finds Mitch held hostage and forced to perform surgery.

programme.title: Tentacles, Part 2
programme.desc: Mitch removes a bullet from an escaped convict, only to realize that he plans on killing him.

programme.title: Submersion
programme.desc: Mitch saves two boys from drowning. But when one ends up in a coma, Mitch suffers from PTSD.

programme.title: Ironman Buchannon
programme.desc: Mitchs birthday prompts him to train for an ironman competition, which causes problems at Baywatch.

programme.title: Ironman Buchannon
programme.desc: Mitchs birthday prompts him to train for an ironman competition, which causes problems at Baywatch.

programme.title: Tower of Power
programme.desc: A new lifeguard helps Mitch and the Baywatch lifeguards confront an upsurge in gang activity.

programme.title: The Child Inside
programme.desc: The Baywatch lifeguards stage a beach-oriented Special Olympics.

programme.title: Second Time Around
programme.desc: Jesse, a beautiful motorcycle racer, returns and puts strain on Matt and Summer’s relationship.

programme.title: The Red Knights
programme.desc: An ad hoc reunion of elite 1950s lifeguards, the "Red Knights," triggers a bar room brawl.

programme.title: Coronado Del Soul, Part 1
programme.desc: The Baywatch lifeguards travel to San Diego for a week where Summer is haunted by a ghost.

programme.title: Coronado Del Soul, Part 2
programme.desc: Adrift in the ocean with his semi-conscious brother, Mitch struggles to keep them both alive.

programme.title: Mirror, Mirror
programme.desc: A beautiful woman and her plain sister compete for Mitchs affection with perilous results.

programme.title: The Falcon Manifesto
programme.desc: A reporter puts her life at risk to publish a story. Can the Baywatch team help her stay alive?

programme.title: Western Exposure
programme.desc: Country singer Jessie Lee Harris pays a visit to Baywatch in search of his estranged wife and son.

programme.title: The Life You Save
programme.desc: Matt and Summer volunteer their time when cutbacks put the Baywatch lifeguards’ jobs in jeopardy.

programme.title: Trading Places
programme.desc: Stephanie spends a week with the Coast Guard to help them crack a dangerous arms smuggling ring.

programme.title: Guys and Dolls
programme.desc: Matt doesnt know whose story to believe when he tries to reunite a runaway teen and her father.

programme.title: Rescue Bay
programme.desc: A Hollywood producer desperate for a new TV series idea observes a Baywatch rescue.

programme.title: Livin on the Fault, Part 1
programme.desc: After a minor earthquake, a geological survey team arrives at Baywatch, but trouble strikes again.

programme.title: Livin on the Fault, Part 2
programme.desc: Stephanie and the geological team are trapped underwater by a massive earthquake!

programme.title: Aftershock
programme.desc: After the earthquake which almost took his life, Hobie leaves California to live with his mother.

programme.title: Baja Run
programme.desc: John Cort shows up at headquarters and convinces Mitch to compete in a dune buggy race.

programme.title: Air Buchannon
programme.desc: Mitch has to work a 24-hour shift with Stephanie and Hobie is pressured into throwing a house party.

programme.title: Shortsighted
programme.desc: Hobie befriends a boy who has moved to California to live with his father after his mothers death.

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Movie
programme.desc: Lous daughter is kidnapped by a crazed drug dealer after the crew repossesses his car.

programme.title: Breaking Barbi
programme.desc: A Tinder date gone astray leaves famous fitness selfie queen, Barbi, lost in the wilderness trying to survive despite Homeland Security, alien death rays and zero cell service.

programme.title: I Remember You
programme.desc: Two strangers feel a supernatural connection after being involved in the same accident.

programme.title: Black Marigolds
programme.desc: Writer Ryan Cole and his Wife Kate go to an off season vacation house where he intends to finish his second novel. But their plans are changed by a devastating mental illness.

programme.title: Treasure Lies
programme.desc: Hardworking teenager Sean feels let down by life, but faces a crisis of character through a series of his own bad decisions.

programme.title: God and Salsa
programme.desc: A grief-stricken therapist determined to help a suicidal teen regains her faith in the process with the help of her Pastor and Salsa instructor.

programme.title: Who Will Move The Stone
programme.desc: A worldly Detroit lawyer decides to represent a Born Again Christian on trial for the murder of a Catholic Priest.

programme.title: Lucky Louie
programme.desc: A retired cop teams up with four ex-convicts and a behavioral science student to solve a fifty year old bank robbery in this new faith filled family comedy.

programme.title: Screened In
programme.desc: Peyton Hawthorne becomes disillusioned when she realizes her phone has taken over her life. She attempts to tackle her addiction but calamity ensues.

programme.title: In His Steps
programme.desc: When a homeless man interrupts the comfortable routine of First Church of Raymond, life will never be the same for the apathetic congregation.

programme.title: 6 Nonsmokers
programme.desc: Dr. Henry Caldwell, the world’s foremost mediator, faces the biggest challenge of his career when he takes on six roommates whose only thing in common is that none of them smoke.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Bandits
programme.desc: When bratty 5-year-old Byron Reed (Chris Williams) acts out the night before a family trip, his mother (Natasha Alam) makes him sit in the time out chair. When Byron awakens to an empty house, he assumes his wish to have no family has come true.

programme.title: Finding Grace
programme.desc: A struggling family, already on the verge of disintegration, faces new challenges that will test their faith in God and each other.

programme.title: Royal Ashes
programme.desc: Nineteen year old Paul Royal is trapped in a life he didnt ask for.

programme.title: A Life Lived
programme.desc: The story about the life of a dollar bill, and the many lives it passes along the way.

programme.title: Without Warrant
programme.desc: A young by-the-book detective gets partnered with a seasoned, renegade undercover cop to solve a brutal gangland murder.

programme.title: A Year And Change
programme.desc: After falling off the roof at a New Years Eve house party, Owen decides that its time to make some wholesale changes in his life.

programme.title: Arc: A Love Story
programme.desc: Lines are crossed and friendships tested when friends Ben and Naomi grow closer together amid a failed relationship and a broken marriage.

programme.title: Elephants
programme.desc: A true indie film through and through, Elephants takes an authentic look at a modern relationship in a "slice of life" style.

programme.title: More Beautiful for Having Been Broken
programme.desc: A female FBI agent befriends a woman and her adorable, young, special needs son who live in the countryside. The womens friendship soon turns into romance.

programme.title: Gold Fools
programme.desc: When a successful family man gets laid off, he leads his friends on a gold panning expedition in the mountains of Sonora, oblivious to what lurks where the water runs real deep.

programme.title: TangerineLAnd
programme.desc: Beth Harris is getting married. The only problem is, she already has a husband; pro-surfer, Sonny Baker.

programme.title: Chelsea
programme.desc: When Chelsea’s best friend Laura gets engaged and moves out of their apartment, she’s left with more than an empty room.

programme.title: Promises
programme.desc: Latchkey kids lose touch when one of them moves away, only to reconnect years later without realizing it, having changed their names to escape their pasts. Once they realize who each other are; they are able heal the wounds of their pasts.

programme.title: Everything I Am
programme.desc: A young teenage girl takes a homeless man into her home, to show the love of christianity in action.

programme.title: Core
programme.desc: A woman rediscovers a relationship shes neglected when her world comes crashing down.

programme.title: American Dream
programme.desc: The American Dream embarks on a journey with two college bound football buddies. They must decide between the fast money on the streets and keeping on a straight path.

programme.title: The Kiss of Lady X
programme.desc: A disgraced former secret agent risks his life as well as the lives of his ragtag team as he seeks revenge against the charismatic terrorist who killed his wife.

programme.title: Closer to God: Jessicas Journey
programme.desc: A mothers faith is tested as her daughter dies of cancer and her estranged father returns.

programme.title: Created Equal
programme.desc: An up-and-coming attorney takes on a case to sue the Catholic Church for discrimination against a young woman who desperately wants to become a priest.

programme.title: Apocalypse War
programme.desc: When two soul mates are trapped together at the end of World War III, their lives are forever entwined.

programme.title: Dead Men
programme.desc: Jesse Struthers and his brother Jake find themselves on the run after a band of men begin murdering their family.

programme.title: Battle B-Boy
programme.desc: A group of talented but financially struggling B-Boys join an underground fighting ring in Downtown Los Angeles that uses Hip-Hop music and Break dancing to battle for money.

programme.title: Astronaut: The Last Push
programme.desc: When a tragic accident cuts short the first manned mission to explore life on the moons of Jupiter, Michael Forrest must make the 3 year journey home to Earth in pure solitude.

programme.desc: A family with kids is taken on a high speed car chase. A intoxicated suspect tries to jump a fence while protesting that he’s not trying to run away. A jealous boyfriend terrorizes his girlfriend and her parents.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E03 Gas up and Run!
programme.desc: A man is tasered twice after struggling with two deputies. A gas station fight ends in a foot chase. A deputy pulls over a pair of quarreling lovers after they run a stop sign.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer arrests a driver who attempts to swallow drugs stashed in his mouth. An officer arrests a repeated drug offender in an area notorious for drug trafficking. An officer pulls over an unlicensed woman driver who is arrested for providing falsified identification.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A homeowner shoots at intruders only he can see. The driver of a stolen truck claims he’s just trying to return the vehicle to a friend. A argument about parenting styles turns ugly when a gun is pulled.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers engage in a vehicular pursuit involving a narcotics suspect. Officers respond to a domestic violence call involving a mother, daughter and the mother’s new husband to be. An officer makes an arrest in a stolen SUV case.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A jaywalker with no ID bolts away from an officer. A man mixes illicit items with his pizza. A woman involved in a domestic violence call blames her monthly issues.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue two juveniles involved in a carjacking. Two men sitting in a truck are spotted hiding something in the console. A man claims he took drug paraphernalia from kids as a good samaritan.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers wrestle an uncooperative driver to the ground after a traffic stop. Deputies search for a man who sent threatening texts to his ex-girlfriend. Two suspects are caught stealing gas.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E05 Tuck and Roll, Hold On!
programme.desc: A stolen vehicle investigation results in a brief foot chase and subsequent arrest. A driver is pulled over and is arrested for the possession of a controlled substance. While on patrol an officer spots an distressed man inside a vehicle with busted windows.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E01 Ignorance is an Excuse
programme.desc: Two men engage in a fist fight on the street over an alleged robbery. A couple claims that they didn’t know the car they are driving is stolen. Occupants of a vehicle claim that all of the contraband found in their car is medical equipment.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E21 Dont Make her Angry
programme.desc: A man needs police assistance when his angry ex-girlfriend crawls through his window. Police must play hide-and-seek when they attempt to execute an arrest warrant. A man is threatened with violence when he refuses to turn his car’s headlights off.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A couple flees a routine traffic stop. An intoxicated woman climbs a tree. Construction workers are pulled over for a hand-to-hand transaction.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Suspects lead Officers on a reckless car chase on residential streets. Police tend to a woman assaulted by her inebriated friend. A DWI suspect is found relieving himself in a public port-a-potty.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man on a late-night bike ride is stopped by officers for not having a headlamp. A suspect in a domestic dispute admits to hitting a woman. A man doesn’t deal with being laughed at by his neighbor in a peaceful way.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E10 Tire Iron Road Rage
programme.desc: Officers respond to a traffic dispute involving an assault with a tire iron. Police are led to a battered woman after she dials 911. Officers on patrol encounter a couple engaged in prostitution.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: During a routine traffice stop, an officer witnesses a cyclist get hit by a motorist. An officer investigates a domestic disturbance call involving some spousal infidelity. Authorities respond to a tip regarding a heavy weight drug dealer.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Detectives chase a suspect who wrecks his car. Police are called when a man headbutts his neighbor. Officers tend to a woman punched in the face by her husband while on the bus.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue a man who attempted to cash a bad check then fled the scene. Police are called when a man’s ex-girlfriend breaks into his house. Police chase an unlicensed teen speeding in a vehicle

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers respond to an assault call which escalates to car chase and the eventual arrest of two suspects. Officers spot a known drug dealer who uses a troubling method to conceal his narcotics. An officer curbs a heckler outside a popular bar.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspicious driver takes police on a neighborhood chase. Officers are called to capture a 12-foot python hiding outside a home. Officers suspect a funny walking motorist is hiding something in his shoe.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E04 No Respect these Days

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies search for a man who ran from a traffic stop. A man being pursued tells officers he was going to his mother’s house. A drunk driver won’t admit to hitting a car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E12 The Car is Mine!
programme.desc: A man locks himself in a trunk after deputies respond to a restraining order call. Deputies respond to two women arguing over the ownership of a car. A driver comes clean to a deputy during a traffic stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A carjacking results in a chase and a flipped vehicle. Suspects crash a truck after attempting to steal beer. A man attempts to swallow his drugs during a bust.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man in New Jersey is arrested for possession. A couple is pulled over while looking to score. A routine traffic stop turns into a fruitful drug bust.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An Officer spots a gun in a vehicle during a routine traffic stop, but the passengers are denying ownership. An intoxicated woman assaults her step-father with a butter knife after he refuses to take her to the hospital for spider bites. A man denies vandalizing a building even though theres evidence on his fingers.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E22 Dealt A Bad Hand

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E33 Be Careful What You Ask For
programme.desc: An irate man begs the police to shoot him. A drunken woman gets nasty after being arrested for domestic assault. Cops wade through lies as they make sense of a most dysfunctional family.

programme.desc: Officers respond to a threatening man with a weapon. A man gives Officers a false name forgetting he’s wearing his name tag. A suspect in a stolen car collides with another vehicle then flees on foot.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A patrolman plays linebacker when a fleeing thief runs right into him. Armed-robbery victims give a colorful play-by-play on surveillance footage of the crime. Officers have to get tearful children back to their estranged mother.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E11 This Man Stabbed Me
programme.desc: A car thief leads police on a high-speed chase until officers pit his vehicle to end the pursuit. Cops cool off a baby and search for the man who left him in a car. Potty-mouthed witnesses inform officers that their friend has been stabbed in the chest.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A vehicle is caught traveling in the opposite direction. A sting operation is designed to nab suspects who purchase narcotics. Officers respond to a shoplifting call at a local thrift store.

programme.title: Cops

programme.sub-title: S13 : E34 Fast Pase Foot Chase
programme.desc: A high speed vehicular pursuit results in foot chase and subsequent arrest. Officers respond to a domestic call involving the residence’s girlfriend and her children who destroyed the man’s house. Police respond to a domestic violence call.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Several squad cars join together in pursuit of a pickup truck. Officers conduct a drug raid utilizing percussion grenades. A suspect wanted for numerous robberies flees from Police in a sports car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers get a tip and locate the suspect in a recent shooting. A woman is questioned when she is found parked alone in her car behind closed businesses. Officers respond to a call involving juveniles spray painting an electrical box.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Multiple units pursue a stolen vehicle on the run. A woman tells Officers her intoxicated boyfriend destroyed her mailbox then fled. A loaded shotgun is found in a vehicle after a brief pursuit.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect flees from police and attempts to hide contraband from them. A driver is pulled over and is literally covered in his crimes. An employee of a cell phone store attempts to scam the police and her employers.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers attempt to detain undocumented people crosssing the border. Border patrol discovers a driver with a load of drugs in his car. Officers check passports and a suspicious-looking laptop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A drunk man threatens both firefighters and the police. Police are called over a dispute regarding an alleged missing dog. A drunk driver changes his story when his friend is found pinned under his car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers respond to a call of a naked man inside a school. A woman being questioned by Police is oblivious to her wardrobe malfunction. Officers on patrol order several female nude sunbathers to cover up.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue a motorcyclist driving erratically. Deputies find broken drug paraphernalia in a car when conducting a traffic stop. A man who beat up his girlfriend hides from officers in an attic.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer attempts to pull over a man on a bicycle who refuses to stop. An officer arrests two suspects involved in a drug deal who attempt to discard the evidence. An officer questions a driver leaving a known drug area.

programme.title: The Commish

programme.title: The Commish

programme.title: Ace Crawford, Private Eye

programme.title: Ace Crawford, Private Eye

programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 I Cant Even Imagine
programme.desc: A young woman returning from a European trip does not get off the plane; two teens do not make it home from a party; and a suicide note is found but no body.

programme.title: Missing Persons
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Thats My Sister, Pal
programme.desc: Carlos and Connie search for a missing teen who has upset a drug lord.

programme.title: Missing Persons
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Mans An Emotional Termite
programme.desc: A young womans parents arrive for a visit and find her missing; a young girl is an apparent runaway; and an older mans entire family disappears.

programme.title: Missing Persons
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 I Cant Even Imagine
programme.desc: A young woman returning from a European trip does not get off the plane; two teens do not make it home from a party; and a suicide note is found but no body.

programme.title: Missing Persons
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Im Gonna Miss Him Too...
programme.desc: A young boy runs away from home, returning to take his little brother with him, after his potential stepfather steals from their home and blames it on him, and then threatens his life. Connie has to trace the family of an heroic John Doe who saved a little girls life, in order to find out what his medical problems are, and along the way feels some chemistry with the surgeon.

programme.title: Missing Persons
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 All They Had To Do Was Ask...
programme.desc: Ray is shocked when he is told his ex-partner is being transferred into his department. Problem is she is female and rumours were rife that they were having an affair. Meanwhile a boy goes missing from party of schoolchildren on a museum tour.

programme.title: Missing Persons
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 My Beautiful Son Is Okay...
programme.desc: Johnny and Connie look for two little boys who went missing on their way home from school, while Bobby has the mysterious disappearance of a woman he met on a recent case on his hands. Carlos, Anita, Ray and Barbara spend the whole episode worrying about baby Carlito Ray who is sick.

programme.title: Missing Persons
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Cabe... What Kind Of Name Is That?
programme.desc: Carlos brings in photos of his newborn son. Bobby searches for the missing son of a Filipino lady, meanwhile a little boy is found who hasnt been reported missing.

programme.title: Missing Persons
programme.desc: Missing dental hygienists car is found with Black Magic books and items in the trunk, and her parents cant seem to decide whether or not they want to find her. A wife goes out for groceries and never comes back. Constance gets flowers.

programme.title: Missing Persons
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 If You Could Pick Your Own Parents...
programme.desc: Elderly man missing, wife attempts suicide. Group plans a holiday party for the lieutenant. Jumpers body hasnt been found and no ones reported him missing. Boy reports his mom is missing.

programme.title: Missing Persons
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 What Do You Want... A Signed Confession?
programme.desc: Bobby is still under investigation for a suspected bribe and perverting the course of justice. Also a little girl is snatched in a department store.

programme.title: Detour
programme.desc: Chance events trap hitch-hiker Al Roberts in a tightening net of film noir trouble.

programme.title: D.O.A.
programme.desc: Frank Bigelow, told hes been poisoned and has only a few days to live, tries to find who killed him and why.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 The Big September Man
programme.desc: Someone murdered a secretary late at night in her office. She was beaten to death with a metal pipe wrapped in newspaper. Could it be the drunk found three blocks away beating his head against a wall?

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 The Big September Man
programme.desc: Someone murdered a secretary late at night in her office. She was beaten to death with a metal pipe wrapped in newspaper. Could it be the drunk found three blocks away beating his head against a wall?

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Friday and Smith receive a bulletin about an armed four-man gang, two of whom are army deserters, who have committed a series of robberies and auto thefts in San Francisco and are on their way to Los Angeles.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: A man is found dead in the gutter. At first it seems as a hit-run case, but Friday and Smith become suspicious when all witnesses from the night before give exactly the same story. Usually witnesses are at variance in some respects.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.sub-title: S03 : E39 The Big False Make
programme.desc: Friday begins to question a local gardener, who has been arrested for holding up a grocery store. During the interrogation Friday begins to have strong doubts about the mans guilt, and sets out to discover why the man has confessed to a crime Friday believes he didnt commit.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Friday and his partner Smith race against time to stop a series of brutal beatings of women in the Hollywood area. Just when they think they have their man, things change and very quickly.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Obscene literature and pictures are spread among youngster at a school in Los Angeles. The supplier of this illegal stuff turns out to be a former film producer from the days of silent movies.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Upper middle-class teenagers in Los Angeles are going crazy. They trash a movie theater, beating up the manager and pushing a young man through a plate glass window. Sergeant Friday must get to the bottom of what is causing this to happen.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: There seems to be a lot of recent theft at retail stores in the city, and Jack Webb and his partner are on the case. The detectives question a salesperson from a big department store downtown, and she denies any involvement. They talk to a woman who was at the bus station, who saw another woman leave a parcel which contained a fur coat. Eventually Webb talks to a teenage girl, who saw a woman discard boxes of new items in a vacant lot. The girl knows the womans identity, and soon the officers are interrogating the shoplifter, a doctors wife with a lot of time on her hands.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Three men are the suspects in the beating death of a former vaudevillian actress found in her apartment. The possible reason for her murder could be among the contents of an old steamer trunk which she kept locked in her room. Surveillance equipment is used to solve the mystery.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.sub-title: S03 : E31 The Big Hit-Run Killer
programme.desc: The detectives try to track down a tall, beautiful woman who has been terrorizing the city by robbing men, beating them up and in some cases shooting them. Their job is made more difficult by the fact that there are many inconsistencies in the victims reports.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: A man swindled out of $1,500 life savings from a familiar bunco scam, substitute jewelry for cash, jewelry is imitation.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: A truck kills an old lady and her little grandson at a crossing and drives away. The owner of the truck asserts that he let a man called Paul lend the truck for one hour, but he doesnt know the last name of this man or where he lives. The police must investigate all circumstances, but should Friday and Smith really spend lots of resources on trying to find a man they hardly believe exists at all?

programme.title: Wiseguy
programme.desc: As McPike is near death in a coma, Kousakis plans to kill Boden and Weiss from his hideaway in Father Patrick�s church.

programme.title: Wiseguy
programme.sub-title: S02 : E21 The Four-Letter Word, Part 1
programme.desc: After a restraining order keeps Vinnie away from Amber, Vinnie uncovers a plan to sell Shakala as part of a large real estate venture.

programme.title: Wiseguy
programme.desc: After the funeral of the assassinated economist Andrew Valenti, Vinnie accelerates his investigation into the covert plot behind the professor�s murder.

programme.title: Wiseguy
programme.desc: In a Senate executive session, a falsely accused Vinnie is systematically stripped of his honor, even as Gen. Masters� diabolical scheme is exposed.

programme.title: Wiseguy
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Player To Be Named Now
programme.desc: When Mels former girlfirend shows up, begging for readmission to the Inner Circle, he humiliates her, using her as a sexual pawn in a power game with a rival; but for Vinnie, forced to watch it happen, the worst is yet to come.

programme.title: Wiseguy
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Sins Of The Father
programme.desc: In his bid for the governor�s seat, Phil Alatorre plans to reveal Vionnie as a mob boss.

programme.title: Wiseguy
programme.desc: Hillary asks Frank and Santana for help in a lawsuit involving defective aircraft parts.

programme.title: Wiseguy
programme.desc: After Vinnie puts the Shakala Records investigation to rest, he and McPike take a trip to the mountains with Lifeguard, whose real-life problems may force him to quit the OCB.

programme.title: Street Patrol
programme.desc: The hunt for a drunk and armed man leads officers to a bar where an arrest is made.

programme.title: Street Patrol
programme.desc: Two gang bangers driving a station wagon are questioned for suspicion of a car theft.

programme.title: Street Patrol
programme.desc: A melee ensues at a public park and a gunshot wound is sustained in the process.

programme.title: Street Patrol
programme.desc: Philadelphia police arrest two for robbery. Fort Worth officers detain assault suspects.

programme.title: Street Patrol
programme.desc: A glass bottle and a mop collide at the scene of a stabbing call.

programme.title: Street Patrol
programme.desc: Officers join EMTs in aiding a bloodied woman at the scene of a domestic disturbance.

programme.title: Street Patrol
programme.desc: The driver of a stolen Jeep bails from the vehicle abandoning a female passenger and a baby.

programme.title: Street Patrol
programme.desc: A shoplifting suspect leads responding officers on a wild foot chase.

programme.title: Street Patrol
programme.desc: A heap of police cars team together in the hunt for a federal fugitive.

programme.title: Street Patrol
programme.desc: A sting operation is conducted in a known drug zone aimed to target low level dealers.

programme.title: Street Patrol
programme.desc: Shotgun pellets are sprayed in a quiet residential area leaving a family with minor injuries.

programme.title: Street Patrol
programme.desc: A step-father and stepson fight at the scene of a heated domestic dispute call.

programme.title: Street Patrol
programme.desc: A vehicle with passengers not wearing seatbelts is pulled over and its discovered that the car may be stolen.

programme.title: D.O.A.
programme.desc: Frank Bigelow, told hes been poisoned and has only a few days to live, tries to find who killed him and why.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On May 17th 2005, a body is discovered in a forest of Sucy-en-Brie; Christophe Belle, 40 years old, a renowned pastry cook.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: The disturbing missing case in Paris of a four year old.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On October 13th 1996, the body of young Angelique Dumetz, 18 years old, is recovered down a ditch in Oise forest. An important clue is found on the crime scene.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On February 23th 2017, policemen are alerted of the disapearrance of Brigitte Troadec, her husband Pascal, and their children Sebastien and Charlotte.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: A Night of Horror at Devils Plateau (Marie-Jeanne Meyer Case) - On June 18, 2011, Marie-Jeanne Meyer, 17-years old, waved goodbye to her little sister before leaving for her daily jog on the heights of Tournon in Ardèche. She never came back. Three days later, her mutilated body was found in a freshly dug pit, near an area known to be cursed, "The Devils Plateau." Whats more, the crime scene looked like a mystical ritual ... Was it a ritual murder? Revenge? An unfortunate encounter? ...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: A Mysterious Murder at the Farm (Valerie Bary Case)- On Friday, March 26, 2004, in the region of Dijon, Laurent Bary came home from his work to discover the lifeless body of his wife, Valerie, bathing in a pool of blood. According to the investigators initial findings, the 38-year-old nurses aid had been stabbed several times, seeming to validate the theory of a robbery gone wrong.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On July 13, 2011, two boaters retrieved a suitcase that was floating in the bay of Lorient. Inside, they discovered the tied up corpse of a man.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Bloody Christmas next to the Leman lake (CASE OF RUTH LÉGERET) - On January 4, 2006, Ruth Legeret was found dead in the middle of a pool of blood at her luxurious property in Vevey, Switzerland. Next to her was the lifeless body of her friend, Marina Studer. Who could have killed these two simple and wealthy widows? Clue after clue, the Swiss polices investigation would revolve around an environment of family jealousy and financial greed.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: September 16 2005. The lifeless body of Audrey Jouannet, 24, is found hidden under the bed in her small apartment in Soisy-sur-Seine. It soon becomes apparent that the young woman has been tortured at length before being strangled. But surprisingly, though the highly meticulous murderer has taken care to leave no sign of his passage, the autopsy reveals traces of sperm on the victim. It will take all of the investigators intuition to pierce the mystery of this heinous crime...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Sylvain Dromard finds the body of his wife Laurence lying in a pool of blood in the kitchen. The crime was particularly violent and the theory of a burglary that went wrong is soon excluded. But investigators dont understand who could want the adorable hairdresser of Saint-Martin-dAblois dead. During the investigation, the work of profilers will enable them to draw a very precise portrait of the murderer...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: After an ordinary dinner, Pierre and Gabrielle Labrell suffer severe abdominal pains.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Nelly Cremel, 39, leaves her home to go jogging... never to return. Eight days later, after a vast search campaign, her body is found. Theres no doubt that its murder. The case soon ignites public opinion, even inflaming passions at the highest level of the state. The clues lead investigators on a number of trails, from the shadows of the French secret service to a manhunt for a possible sex maniac, in a case of murder most foul.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Willy Pomonti, a retired architect, is found savagely murdered in his opulent villa in La Celle-Saint-Cloud, near Paris. It soon becomes clear that the man has been tortured prior to death. At several points during this extraordinary enquiry, police will feel theyre holding the culprit... It will take them ten years to finally shed light on this particularly violent crime.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: The lifeless body of Christophe Lejard is found by his son just metres from their home. The man was shot in the head as he was getting into his car to go to work. A veritable execution, which at first glance doesnt square with the profile of the quiet family man. Yet behind the appearances, the investigation gradually reveals all the hate and resentment that revolved around the victim.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: A man walks into a gendarmerie near Saint-Malo to report that his wife has been missing since the previous day. The couple are going through a divorce, but this mother would never have left her seven children alone! An extensive search is undertaken but the woman cannot be found. What has happened to Adeline Piet? The investigation spans several years and experiences many twists.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: The corpse of Priscillia Ciatti, 14, is discovered by the side of a field, a few hundred metres from her family home. The teenager has been stabbed sixty times with a knife and -an extra sordid detail - a devil mask is found next to her body. Was Priscillia the victim of a prowler? A serial killer? A maniac inspired by a horror movie? Investigators soon find that the young girl felt she was being watched, and even threatened...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: In the early hours of the morning, Mathilde Croguennec, 18, attending "Teknival" in Brittany, is found at the foot of a tree with her throat cut. Investigators face the task of finding the killer from among the 43,000 participants of this huge open-air festival of electronic music, where drink and drugs are consumed in abundance. An unusual investigation that leads the police down a number of false avenues.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Arriving at her work, the secretary of a small firm in the suburbs of Geneva finds the body of Jean-Raymond Blatti, the companys new accountant. The man is lying in a pool of blood and, on his belly, the murderer has written "DIRTY RAPIST". Yet Jean-Raymond Blatti was never charged with sexual assault. Over the course of the investigation, this inscription will appear as one of the many mysteries of this case which is particularly rich in twists and turns.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On July 19th 2004, the naked and tied up body of a woman is recovered in the Ourcq canal in Fresnes-sur-Marne. The victim is impossible to identify.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On April 3th 2003, Chantal Ternik, a 48 year old housewife, is discovered hanged in her house of Sanary-sur-Mer, in Var.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On March 28th 2013, the burnt body of Anne Barbot, 38 years old, is discovered in a forest of Maine-et-Loire.

programme.desc: On a hot summers day in 1934, a horrifying discovery was made in the trunk at the luggage office of Brighton Train Station. Two days later, a similar case was found.

programme.title: The Acid Bath Murders
programme.desc: As police investigated the disappearance of a wealthy widow, Olive Durand Deacon, in early 1949, they could not have imagined the gruesome confession told to them.

programme.title: The Towpath Murders
programme.desc: In the summer of 1953, the world watched Queen Elizabeth II crowned. The day before the coronation the body of a teenage girl was found floating in the River Thames.

programme.title: The Lady Killer
programme.desc: As Europe recovered from the damage of WWII, soldiers made their way home from the front line. But one man brought back all the savagery and brutality of the fighting.

programme.title: Notting Hill Horror Part 1
programme.desc: John Christie brought death to everyone around him. He managed to pin his terrible crimes on another man_who would be sentenced to death.

programme.desc: John Christie brought death to everyone around him. He managed to pin his terrible crimes on another man who would be sentenced to death. He eluded capture for years.

programme.title: Hitlers Dealer
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Raider Of The Lost Art
programme.desc: Munich, 2013 a giant haul of missing masterpieces were found. Gurlitt was the man behind it. His fathers job was to purchase works for Hitler for the Fuhrermuseum.

programme.title: Faberge Eggs
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Raider Of The Lost Art
programme.desc: Each year Carl Faberge made one of a kind Easter egg for the Tsars family. When Carl fled Russia during the revolution, 8 of these priceless Imperial Eggs went missing.

programme.title: Vincent Van Gogh
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Raider Of The Lost Art
programme.desc: When Van Gogh died, he was a complete unknown, his paintings fetching under 10 dollars. So how did his works become some of the most revered and expensive in the world?

programme.title: Monuments Men
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Raider Of The Lost Art
programme.desc: During WWII the Nazis plundered some of the worlds greatest artworks as they tore across Europe. We find out how the Allies tracked them down.

programme.title: Leonardo da Vinci
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Raider Of The Lost Art
programme.desc: The story of the theft of the Mona Lisa in 1911 from the Louvre and how Pablo Picasso was accused of the crime.

programme.title: Vermeer
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Raider Of The Lost Art
programme.desc: The Dutch didnt appreciate what they had. For 200 years Vermeer was completely forgotten.

programme.title: Hitlers Dealer
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Raider Of The Lost Art
programme.desc: Munich, 2013 a giant haul of missing masterpieces were found. Gurlitt was the man behind it. His fathers job was to purchase works for Hitler for the Fuhrermuseum.

programme.title: LIKE BUTTON | The Unintended Consequences of the Facebook Like Button
programme.desc: When first presented with the like button (then dubbed “the awesome button”) Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg had a simple response: “No.”

programme.title: CUBICLE | How the Cubicle Became Universally Hated
programme.desc: A futuristic designer, Robert Propst, dreamed up “The Action Office” as a workplace utopia that would unleash the modern knowledge worker’s vast untapped potential.

programme.title: BARCODE | How The Barcode Shaped Our Modern Economy
programme.desc: Barcodes have radically changed global commerce, helping fuel the rise of everything from massive companies like Walmart to world powers like China.

programme.title: FLORIDA | How Real Estate Rogues Invented Florida As We Know It
programme.desc: In the 1920s, an army of real estate boosters set out to redefine Florida from an economic backwater to a vacation hotspot.

programme.title: MAUVE | The Fake Color That Made Our Modern World
programme.desc: In 1856, a chemistry student accidentally created a strange substance with a rich purple hue -- the world’s first synthetic dye.

programme.title: VANILLA | The Bean That Shaped the Future of Food
programme.desc: In 1841 on the small island of Reunion, a 12-year-old slave did something no one had done before; artificially pollinate the vanilla plant.

programme.title: WIFI | The Hollywood Actress Who Laid the Groundwork For Wi-Fi
programme.desc: Actress Hedy Lamarr, “the worlds most beautiful woman,” had a knack for inventing. During WWII, she devised a technology designed to intercept Axis communications.

programme.title: STREAMING | The Invention That Revolutionized Streaming Video
programme.desc: The early days of online video were plagued by low resolution, stamp-sized video, and unbearable buffering times. But one day that all changed.

programme.title: INTERSTATE | How The Interstate Connected and Divided America
programme.desc: Dwight Eisenhower’s interstate highway system was the biggest infrastructure project of its time, a bold plan to connect all corners of America.

programme.title: EDISON | How Edison Reinvented Invention
programme.desc: Edison pioneered the world’s first research and development center in Menlo Park, New Jersey.
