programme.title: Merging Man and Machine
programme.desc: Why fear the rise of the machines, when we can merge and rise along with them?

programme.title: The Suppressed Science Of Psychedelics
programme.desc: Join Athena as she explores the underground world of psychedelic science, and the revolutionary impact it is poised to have on the pharmaceutical industries.

programme.title: Race: Science, Social Construct, or Both?
programme.desc: The concept of race was invented during colonial and imperialist eras as a means to reify political power structures.

programme.title: Weather Control: The Debate Over Geo-Engineering
programme.desc: In this episode, Athena takes on the controversial topic of Geoengineering, and meets scientists working on an ambitious plan to put a shield around the planet.

programme.title: Human Enhancement
programme.desc: From a cutting-edge, science-based gym and spa, to a medical clinic that offers direct ultrasound brain stimulation designed to increase mental performance.

programme.title: Genetic Editing
programme.desc: The discovery of CRISPR Cas-9 in 2012 opened up seemingly limitless potential in the field of genetic editing.

programme.title: Alternative Energy Sources
programme.desc: In this installment, Athena decodes some of the difficulties faced by the scientists and environmentalists looking to fundamentally change our relationship with energy.

programme.title: Theories Of Everything
programme.desc: Over the centuries, scientific theories have emerged that rival religious cosmology in terms of ambition and scope. But can science ever truly explain everything?

programme.title: Mother Of The Everglades
programme.desc: Strap-in for a breathtaking tour of the history and wildlife of Lake Okeechobee, one of the largest freshwater lakes in the United States, and the source of life for South Floridas magnificent Everglades.

programme.title: Catching Floridas Apex Predator
programme.desc: Top trappers from Florida Fish and Wildlife go to battle each day against dangerous nuisance alligators that lurk beneath the lush lakes and canals of Palm Beach.

programme.title: Parasite Planet
programme.desc: Should we save parasites? These species have a bad reputation but are an essential part of healthy ecosystems throughout the world.

programme.title: Antarctica Science Below Zero
programme.desc: Antarctica is a mysterious and unexplored continent. Thanks to the Chilean Antarctic Institute and the research center Dynamics of Marine Ecosystems of High Latitudes, a group of scientists are suffering the extreme temperatures to study climate change and the earths ocean currents.

programme.title: Amazon Burning
programme.desc: More than 60,000 fires scorched the Amazon in 2019 causing enormous damage to an ecosystem that’s vital to human existence. What caused the devastating blazes, how will they impact the climate crisis and will the Amazon ever be able to recover?

programme.title: Secret Underwater Planet
programme.desc: Take a journey with famed underwater photographer Peter Kragh, as he explores the coast of California, and reveals some of the most spectacular life found under the sea.

programme.title: Climate Crisis
programme.desc: The real impact of global warming is now being felt in communities around the world. Climate scientists explain what to expect where you live.

programme.title: Extreme Wildfire Combat
programme.desc: After record-setting conflagrations erupted in the region’s prized forests, new tools using cutting edge technology are being developed to help save property and lives.

programme.title: Greenland is Melting
programme.desc: The Greenland ice sheet, the last remnant of the Ice Age, is melting at an unprecedented rate. Today, scientists and researchers from all over the world are paying close attention to what could become a global catastrophe.

programme.title: Sea Level Rise
programme.desc: By 2100 over 1 billion people on Earth will live in low-lying coastal zones. 70% of these will live in Southeast Asia, a highly vulnerable region to climate change.

programme.title: Tsunami Coastal Lab
programme.desc: Natural hazards remain a constant challenge for over 400 million people who live in low lying communities built along major mega delta regions in coastal zones.

programme.title: Volcanic Field Lab
programme.desc: Many people now know that climate change is real, that they see the data or they see the observations for themselves. Whats needed now is a sense of urgency.

programme.title: Food Security
programme.desc: Rice, its a staple food for many in Asia. It provides 1/3 of the energy in the average Asian diet and is the income source for more than 500 million people.

programme.title: Great White Shark
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Secret Lives of Sharks
programme.desc: Travel to South Africa, one of the worlds great shark hot spots, as Andy Casagrande observes the iconic great white shark and its behavior when hunting fur seals.

programme.title: Hammerhead Shark
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Secret Lives of Sharks
programme.desc: Travel to the Bahamas as Andy Casagrande attempts to place a fin camera on the elusive hammerhead shark… what could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Tiger Shark
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Secret Lives of Sharks
programme.desc: Wildlife filmmaker Andy Casagrande travels off the coast of North Carolina to document never before seen behavior of one of the most misunderstood sharks in the world.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner

programme.desc: A train passenger behaves oddly en route to Arizona and then disappears.

programme.title: Take Shelter
programme.desc: Cannesissa palkitussa elokuvassa ohiolainen Curtis viettaa rauhallista elamaa vaimonsa ja kuuron tyttarensa kanssa, mutta nakee piinaavan todentuntuisia enneunia uhkaavasta myrskysta. Mielenterveyttaan epaillen mies hakeutuu laakarin puheille, mutta unien jatkuessa han alkaa varautua vanhaa maanalaista myrskysuojaa parantelemalla. Onko puhuri sittenkaan todella tulossa ja tarvitseeko Curtisin perhe lopulta suojaa myrskytuulilta vai Curtisilta itseltaan?

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: Varastetut lapset
programme.desc: Kolme puoliksi valkoihoista ja puoliksi aboriginaalia tyttoa koulutetaan tyoskentelemaan kotiapulaisina valkoisissa perheissa ja heita valmistellaan menemaan naimisiin valkoihoisten miesten kanssa. Mutta tytot paattavat paeta, ja he lahtevat seuraamaan yli 1 500 mailin pituista osavaltion raja-aitaa mullistavassa seikkailussa Australian eramaassa.

programme.title: Jimmy P.
programme.desc: Huolestunut Amerikan alkuperaisasukas muodostaa poikkeuksellisen ystavyyden ranskalaisen psykoanalyytikon kanssa, kun he yrittavat loytaa parannuskeinon karsimykselleen.

programme.title: Wicker Park
programme.desc: Matthew och Lisa ar oskiljaktiga. Deras passionerade karlek går inte att ta miste på. Men så plotsligt forsvinner hon- lamnar honom utan ett ord- och Matthews varld rasar samman. Nu, två år senare, har Matthew borjat komma over den varsta saknaden. Men nar han plotsligt får vad han tror ar en skymt av henne i folkvimlet ar det som att han blivit traffad av blixten- han måste få se henne. Efter ett intensivt letande hittar han henne. Tror han. For nar smartan och begaret blir for stort kan den forvranga dina sinnesbilder.

programme.title: Auggie
programme.desc: Felix Greystonen elakeikaan olisi viela tovi, mutta firma painostaa Felixin aikaistetulle elakkeelle. Laksiaislahjaksi han saa alylasit, jotka herattavat kayttajan suurimmat haaveet eloon. Kun Felixin vaimon ura on nousukiidossa ja tytar itsenaistymassa, mies huomaa tuntevansa itsensa kovin yksinaiseksi. Paetakseen piinaavaa yksinaisyytta Felix ajautuu yha syvemmalle alylasiensa maailmaan, joka hiertaa entisestaan Felixin suhdetta etaantyneeseen perheeseensa.

programme.title: The Good Heart
programme.desc: Kohtalo ja viides sydankohtaus heittavat akaisen, mutta sydamellisen Jacquesin elamaan nuoren Lucasin, jolle mies paattaa luovuttaa baarinsa asiakkaineen. Naisia ei anniskelupaikassa kaivata, ja miesten ystavyys joutuukin koetukselle Lucasin rakastuessa kauniiseen Apriliin.

programme.title: In Tranzit
programme.desc: Toisen maailmansodan paatyttya joukko saksalaisia sotavankeja lahetetaan leningradilaiselle vankileirille. Leirin naistyontekijat vihaavat heidan miehensa ja poikansa tappaneita saksalaisia yli kaiken ja valmistautuvat nyt kostoon.

programme.title: Laitakaupungin valot
programme.desc: Laitakaupungin valot kertoo yovartijana tyoskentelevasta Koistisesta, joka joutuu petoksen uhriksi. Laitakaupungin valot oli mukana vuoden 2006 Cannesin elokuvajuhlien kansainvalisessa kilpasarjassa. Elokuva palkittiin parhaan elokuvan Jussi-palkinnolla vuonna 2007. Lisaksi Timo Salminen voitti Jussin parhaasta kuvauksesta ja Markku Patila parhaasta lavastuksesta.

programme.title: Beatrix Potter
programme.desc: Han on ihastuttanut monia sukupolvia, mutta hanen elamansa on ollut salaisuus. Tahan saakka. Beatrix Potter on 30-vuotias sinkkunainen aikana, jolloin naisen kunnioitettavin tehtava on menna hyviin naimisiin. Kukaan, ei edes Beatrixin oma perhe, ymmarra sita, etta Beatrix haluaa mieluummin piirtaa ja kertoa tarinoita elaimista. Kaikki menee pieleen, kun Beatrix tapaa kokemattoman kustantajan Norman Waynen, joka rakastuu korviaan myoten niin Beatrixin ainutlaatuisiin tarinoihin kuin itse Beatrixiinkin. Beatrix joutuu mahdottomaan tilanteeseen, jossa hanen pitaa irrottautua perheen tukahduttavasta otteesta.

programme.title: The Greatest
programme.desc: Allen ja Grace Brewerin vanhin poika on kuollut auto-onnettomuudessa. Yhtakkiaovikello soi, ja oven takana on Rose. Han vaittaa tunteneensa pojan ja kantavansahanen lastaan. Tieto saa perheen etaantymaan toisistaan. Voiko kauheista onnettomuuksista seurata kuitenkin jotain hyvaa?

programme.title: This is England
programme.desc: Elokuva sijoittuu 1980-luvun Englantiin, jossa Falklandin sotaan lahetetaan jatkuvasti lisaa sotilaita ja kansallismieliset saavat jalansijaa tyovaenluokkaisten tyottomien keskuudessa. Skan ja Oi-punkin kannattajat jakautuvat musiikin ystaviin ja skineihin. Taman kaiken keskella 12-vuotias Shaun loytaa skinijengin kanssa yhteisen savelen.

programme.title: Undergods
programme.desc: Mustalla huumorilla viimeistelty scifidystopia maailmasta, jossa vain harva on selvinnyt ja selviytyjistakin jokainen on omalla tavallaan vahan rikki. Kafkamainen miljoo yhdistettyna 2020-luvun romahtaneisiin unelmiin saa jo itsessaan katsojan ihon kananlihalle. Elokuva alkaa, kun kaksi ruumiinkeraajaa kiertelee pitkin autioituneita katuja ja kertoilee tyonsa lomassa romuttuneista haaveistaan, jotka ajoivat heidat tahan kolkkoon nykyhetkeen.

programme.title: The Crying Game
programme.desc: Brittisotilas Jody joutuu IRA:n sieppaamaksi. Jodyn ja hanen vartijansa Fergusin valille muodostuu ystavyyssuhde. Kun Jodyn vapauttamiselle asetetut ehdot eivat toteudu, juuri Fergus maarataan teloittamaan Jody. Tehtava osoittautuu vaikeaksi Fergusille. Fergus pakenee ja aloittaa uuden elaman Lontoossa. Myos Jodyn aiempi elama kietoutuu Fergusin elamaan. The Crying Game on Oscar-palkittu jannityselokuva. Paaosissa Forest Whitaker, Stephen Rea ja Jaye Davidson.

programme.title: Kohtalokas Syrjahyppy (Unfaithful)
programme.desc: Edward ja Connie Sumner ovat keski-ikainen pariskunta, jotka elavat amerikkalaista unelmaa New Yorkin esikaupunkialueella. Naennaisesti onnellisesti naimisissa olevien Sumnerien, joilla on kahdeksanvuotias poika, koira ja taloudenhoitaja, hiljainen maailma murtuu, kun satunnainen kohtaaminen muukalaisen kanssa vetaa Connien suhteeseen, joka voisi merkita enemman kuin vain avioliiton paattymista. KOHTALOKAS SYRJÄHYPPY on eroottinen trilleri syyllisyydesta ja raivosta, joka kysyy vaikeimpia kysymyksia kaikista suhteista.

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: Kesahetket (Summer Hours)
programme.desc: Helène on suvun matriarkka, joka on omistanut elamansa taiteen ja antiikkiesineiden keraamiselle. Kun hanen elamansa lopulta paattyy, hanen kolme lastaan saavat suuren perinnon kauniin vanhan maalaistalon ja kaiken siihen kuuluvan muodossa, mutta lapset ovat kaikkea muuta kuin yhta mielta siita, miten perintokohteita tulisi hallita. Kesahetket on Kultainen palmu -voittaja Olivier Assayasin vakeva perhedraama, jonka rooleissa nahdaan Juliette Binoche, Charles Berling ja Jeremie Renier.

programme.title: Dinner Rush
programme.desc: Elokuva sijoittuu Manhattanille, Louis Cropan omistamaan ravintola Gigino Trattoriaan. Louis Cropan poika Udo toimii ravintolan paakokkina, ja on onnistunut saavuttamaan ravintolalle mainetta kokkaustaidoillaan. Louis Cropa ei kuitenkaan ole iloinen aikaisemmin perinteista kotiruokaa tarjoilleen trattoriansa muuttumisesta yhdeksi New Yorkin trendikkaimmista ravintoloista. Omistajan elamantilannetta ei helpota sekaan, etta hanen liikekumppaninsa on vasta vahan aikaan sitten murhattu, ja hanen suojatikseen ottamansa ravintolan apukokki Duncan karsii pahasta peliriippuvuudesta.

programme.title: The Conversation
programme.desc: Elokuva perustuu tositapahtumaan kahden vaikutusvaltaisen miehen tapaamisesta. Heidan filosofiansa ja nakemyksensa maansa tulevaisuudesta olivat hyvin erilaiset. Eletaan vaarallista aikaa, kun sota Balkanilla oli voitettu, natsit kukistettu ja puna-armeija oli lahella. Miesten valinen keskustelu muokkasi maailmaa.

programme.title: The Dark Divide - Elamaan eksynyt
programme.desc: Tositapahtumiin perustuva Sukuvika -sarjasta tutun David Crossin ja Will and Grace -sarjasta tunnetun Debra Messingin tahdittama draamakomedia. Robert on perhostutkija, jonka vaimo sairastuu syopaan. Vaimo patistaa maansa myyneen miehen perhosretkelle, jonka odottamattomat kohtaamiset ja odotetut vastoinkaymiset avaavat Robertin silmat jalleen.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: Vuonna 1961 Neuvostoliiton ensimmainen ydinsukellusvene lahtee ensimmaiselle matkalleen Pohjois-Atlantille. Mutta sukellusvene ei toimi optimaalisesti, ja koska ydinreaktorissa ilmenee ongelmia, silla on katastrofaaliset seuraukset miehistoon. Miehiston on taisteltava yhdessa ydinkatastrofin valttamiseksi, joka on seka hengenvaarallinen etta voi aloittaa uuden maailmansodan suurvaltojen valilla.

programme.title: Griffin and Phoenix
programme.desc: Kun Griffin saa kuulla, etta hanella on kuolemaan johtava sairaus, han paattaa ottaa kohtalonsa omiin kasiinsa ja elaa taysilla loppuun asti. Han tapaa Phoenixin ja aikaa myoten rakastuu tahan, mutta myos Phoenixilla on salaisuus...

programme.title: White Oleander
programme.desc: Astrid on 15-vuotias tytto, jonka elama muuttuu peruuttamattomalla tavalla, kun poliisi saapuu pidattamaan hanen aitiaan. Ingrid-aiti paatyy telkien taakse murhattuaan poikaystavansa ja alaikainen Astrid aloittaa oman kujanjuoksunsa. Sijaiskoti toisensa jalkeen tulee tutuksi kapinalliselle teini-ikaiselle, joka yrittaa epatoivoisesti loytaa oman identiteettinsa ihmisten ja maisemien alati vaihtuessa hanen ymparillaan. Astridin tavatessa pojan nimelta Paul heraa toivo, etta myos ystavyydella ja rakkaudella voisi olla sijaa hanen elamassaan.

programme.title: Gringa
programme.desc: Ongelmia kokenut teinitytto lahtee Meksikoon etsimaan isaansa, jota han ei edes tunne. He opettelevat yhdessa olemaan perhe, vaikka ensin heita yhdistavat vain menetykset.

programme.title: On Aika Tappaa
programme.desc: Elokuvan ohjaaja on Joel Schumacher (Batman Forever, Paamies). Sandra Bullock, Samuel L. Jackson, Matchew McConaughey ja Kevin Spacey esittavat paaosia murhaoikeudenkaynnissa, joka nostaa pienen mississippilaiskaupungin rotujannitteet valokeilaan. Aktivistimarssien, Ku Kluz Klanin hirmuvallan, mediarummutuksen ja vakivaltaisten mellakoiden keskella kokematon, mutta idealistinen nuori asianajaja jarjestaa aj atuksia herattavan oikeussalitaistelun oikeuden puolesta. Loisteliaasseen nayttelijakaartiin kuuluvat myos Breda Fricker, Oliver Platt, CharlesS. Dutton, Ashley Judd, Patrick McGoohan, Chris Cooper ja seka Donald etta Kiefer Sutherland.

programme.title: Candy
programme.desc: Candy (Abbie Cornish) ja Dan (Heath Ledger) rakastavat toisiaan ja heroiinia, joka tuntuu vain lisaavan heidan keskinaista onneaan. Mikaan ei voi menna pieleen, kunhan heilla on toisensa. Avioliitto ja lapsi vain lujittavat sidetta. Mutta vahitellen harmiton tapa saa yliotteen ja uhkaa tuhota pienen paratiisin. Candyn vanhemmat ja Danin ystava Casper (Geoffrey Rush) alkavat menettaa toivonsa pariskunnan vajotessa yha syvemmalle omaan rakkauden ja heroiinin savyttamaan maailmaansa...

programme.title: Koston liekki
programme.desc: Rankasti ryyppaava, loppuunpalanut CIA:n agentti John Creasy (Denzel Washington) on luopunut toivosta elamansa suhteen – kunnes hanet palkataan yhdeksanvuotiaan Pita Ramosin (Dakota Fanning) henkivartijaksi. Pala palalta Creasyn sisin alkaa eheytya, mutta kun Pita kidnapataan, paasee Creasyn tukahdutettu raivo valloilleen eika han pysahdy ennen kuin teko on kostettu. Loppuun asti.

programme.title: Son of the South
programme.desc: KKK-jasenen poika varttuu etelaisissa Yhdysvalloissa 1960-luvun alussa ja lopulta han liittyy mukaan kansalaisoikeustaisteluun.

programme.title: Flock and Key

programme.title: Ball in the Family

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: An investigation into the murder of Katie Poirier is stymied by the lack of a body. Finally, investigators use a single tooth found among some charred remains to identify her.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When hunters found a skull in a Texas canyon, police found bits of clothing, small bones and a strand of hair. A forensic artist reconstructed her face. Now all they had to do was find her killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a man is shot down in his garage, police discover that a wound on the widow may have been self-inflicted.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1996, Indiana police identified Richard Alexander as the "River Park Rapist" who assaulted four women that year. Later, DNA analysis casts doubt on his conviction.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: An obstetrician returned home from the hospital and found his wife on the bathroom floor. She was covered with blood and not breathing. He tried unsuccessfully to revive her, staining his clothes with her blood in the process, and then he called 911.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A teenager went missing after an evening of horseback riding. Her body was found a month later, three miles from her home. The killer unknowingly left trace evidence behind - tiny but unmistakable clues which pointed to him and him alone.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman convicted of killing her mother in a car fire is granted a new trial. An expert witness has a different opinion as to how the fire started and, if proven, would clear the woman of any culpability.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A womans death in Pennsylvania triggers a homicide investigation into a womans death in North Carolina.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: With no forensic evidence inside a murder scene, investigators were baffled. But they suspected that the victims dog had witnessed the crime.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A 19-year-old woman was found dead in her car, the scene had been staged to make murder appear to be suicide

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1999, a 12-year-old was found murdered in her home in Minnesota. Despite a meticulous search of the home and an exhaustive investigation, police had no suspects.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When more than 700 Oregonians contracted food poisoning from a unique strain of salmonella in 1984, investigators uncovered a secret plot to influence local elections.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When the mail-order bride of a former army sergeant goes missing, investigators look into the deaths of the mans previous two wives.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The body of 16-year-old Leanne Tiernan was discovered nine months after she disappeared. Forensic scientists found clues that painted a virtual portrait of her killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman is killed while walking her dogs in the woods. Since she has no enemies and her husband has an alibi, police assume its a hunting accident - until they find a strange letter, allegedly written by the woman before her death.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a young woman disappeared, police feared she was the latest victim in a string of similar crimes.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A man who had committed crimes including murder was not caught. Almost 50 years later, advances in technology and handwriting analysis uncovered the criminal.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Janet Overton died suspiciously in 1988, and the investigation hit a dead end when the autopsy indicated no foul play was involved. A telephone tip and the sensitive nose of a forensic examiner indicated otherwise.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A murder investigation in Florida crosses jurisdictions from New York and Jamaica. The police rely on cell phone mapping, wiretapping and a host of forensic evidence to link a suspect to a murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a talented television news anchor is shot to death outside her home, it appears to be a crime of passion perpetrated by an obsessed fan.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: At a murder scene, investigators find a shoe-print, several foreign hairs, and unknown fingerprints. But they believe the most telling piece of evidence is the bite mark on the victim.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When the body of a young woman is found under an isolated highway ramp, a unique fiber on the victims clothing leads San Diego police straight to the most unlikely of killers.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A healthy young man dies mysteriously in his sleep, and toxicology tests reveal a lethal dose of lidocaine in his blood.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A suspicious fire swept through an apartment killing two young women. A closer look at the fire scene revealed something hidden in the ashes.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1996, Indiana police identified Richard Alexander as the "River Park Rapist" who assaulted four women that year. Later, DNA analysis casts doubt on his conviction.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A teen was killed by her parents in what they said was self-defense, but forensic evidence told otherwise.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The people of the small town of Hanford lost their sense of peace when one of their own was murdered.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Three homicides on two continents looked like professional executions. Investigators on both sides of the Atlantic needed to find out if they were related and, if they were, who or what they had in common.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2002, the eyes of the world were on Virginia and Maryland. A serial sniper was on the loose, killing innocent, unsuspecting citizens. Just how was he caught?

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A man died in his home after a history of heart disease. Rumors surfaced that the death was no accident.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A serial arsonist starts several fires that cause millions of dollars worth of damage and the deaths of three people. He is discovered, partly through the use of forensic hypnosis.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: With no forensic evidence inside a murder scene, investigators were baffled. But they suspected that the victims dog had witnessed the crime.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When police discovered the body of Douglas Beamishs estranged wife, authorities linked 20 cat hairs found on her jacket to a cat owned by Beamishs parents. It was the first time animal DNA was used to solve a criminal case.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A three-year-old develops a respiratory condition. His father has Alzheimers. An investigator reveals that their ill health is due to mold in their modern home.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A mother of two vanishes after a shopping trip. Her body is discovered a month later. Witnesses say they saw the victim being forced into a car by an unknown person.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a wealthy real estate tycoon goes missing, it appears to be foul play. In his will, he leaves instructions in case he should die under violent circumstances - which were carried out after a hiker comes across his bullet-ridden skull.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The police investigate when a severed leg is discovered among garbage. Conventional means of identifying the victim are impossible, leading investigators to rely on DNA, forensic anthropology and toxicology.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a man is shot down in his garage, police discover that a wound on the widow may have been self-inflicted.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1991, when the wife of a serviceman was brutally murdered in the Philippines, investigators had to reassemble a 5-1/4 inch computer disk which had been cut to pieces with pinking shears in order to find the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Two people witness a truck driving over an unconscious man and flee into a nearby bar, but when the police turn up, the truck, the man and the witnesses are gone.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Discovering that an assault suspect is left-handed is crucial to a police investigation dating back 16 years.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A young TV news producer is raped and murdered in her apartment. Investigators turn to the Commonwealth of Virginias DNA Databank.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A drive-by shooting leaves one man dead and another seriously wounded. Cell phone calls and shell casings point to a suspect, but authorities are unable to place him at the crime scene.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The murder of an American tourist in a Mexican resort draws law enforcement resources in both countries.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A killer tried to incinerate and destroy everything that could link him to his crime. But in doing so, he inadvertently created new forensic evidence, evidence which came to light with a technique never before used in a criminal investigation.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A mother of two young children was found dead in her bedroom. Her death was ruled a suicide.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A cop is found dead. His wife first says the motive was robbery; then she tells police it was suicide.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Time of death becomes pivotal after a pregnant woman is found murdered in her air-conditioned bedroom.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When police recovered the car of a missing man, they expected to find his body - but it wasnt there.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A man is found dead in his home, and his ex-wife has a perfect alibi. To determine time of death, investigators need to know when the victim ate his last meal.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A nurse experiences a variety of flu-like symptoms. None of her doctors are able to discover the cause,

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When Genell Plude is found dead in her bathroom, the scene points to suicide. But a coroners inquest and a unique application of forensic science gave investigators a different explanation for her death.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A Native American woman was brutally killed in the desert of New Mexico, and the crime scene was rich in forensic evidence: tire tracks, shoe impressions and even the murder weapons.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1984, California firefighters battled ten arson fires in three weeks. When cigarettes and a scrap of paper connected the case to similar fires further north, the hunt was on for a dangerous pyromaniac.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Haunted by the disappearance of her mother, a young woman undertakes an investigation of her own. In her mothers diary, she discovers a dark family secret that might explain the disappearance.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A young couple decided to celebrate their first wedding anniversary with a camping trip to Mount Hood.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1993, the Amtrak Railroad experienced the deadliest train crash in United States history when the Sunset Limited derailed while crossing Alabamas Big Bayou Canot bridge.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: An obstetrician returned home from the hospital and found his wife on the bathroom floor. She was covered with blood and not breathing. He tried unsuccessfully to revive her, staining his clothes with her blood in the process, and then he called 911.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Residents of Noel, Missouri were stunned to learn that their bank had been robbed and the bank president was missing. His body was later found floating in a lake, securely bound to a chair with duct tape.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Emergency dispatch received a call from a man who said his girlfriend shot and killed herself. The autopsy revealed that the gunshot wound was not self-inflicted and the evidence on her body would give police a golden opportunity to catch her killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A cop is found dead. His wife first says the motive was robbery; then she tells police it was suicide.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Emergency dispatch received a call from a man who said his girlfriend shot and killed herself. The autopsy revealed that the gunshot wound was not self-inflicted and the evidence on her body would give police a golden opportunity to catch her killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1996, Indiana police identified Richard Alexander as the "River Park Rapist" who assaulted four women that year. Later, DNA analysis casts doubt on his conviction.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: With no forensic evidence inside a murder scene, investigators were baffled. But they suspected that the victims dog had witnessed the crime.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When Genell Plude is found dead in her bathroom, the scene points to suicide. But a coroners inquest and a unique application of forensic science gave investigators a different explanation for her death.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A teen was killed by her parents in what they said was self-defense, but forensic evidence told otherwise.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A murder investigation in Florida crosses jurisdictions from New York and Jamaica. The police rely on cell phone mapping, wiretapping and a host of forensic evidence to link a suspect to a murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Police are led on a wild goose chase when the wife of a prominent banker is kidnapped. An entomologists unexpected discovery leads to a new suspect - and the realization that ordinary office equipment can leave extraordinary clues.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman disappeared along a California highway in 1991. Three years later, the case was solved when a mans refrigerated truck was looked upon with suspicion.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A killer tried to incinerate and destroy everything that could link him to his crime. But in doing so, he inadvertently created new forensic evidence, evidence which came to light with a technique never before used in a criminal investigation.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a pipe bomb rips through a rural home, killing a young man and seriously injuring his mother, detectives hope that the remnants of a mailing label will lead them to a killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a 62-year-old man opens a car restoration business and becomes seriously ill, his doctors cannot find the cause, but forensics can; identification of a highly toxic metal in the victims blood leads to his poisoner.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A serial arsonist was on the loose in Washington, DC. Each of the fires was started with the same type of incendiary device. The perpetrator was very careful, and seemed to leave no evidence behind... but there were clues in the ashes and it was up to forensic scientists to find them.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: After the murder of Seattle residents, evidence from the couples dog eventually ties a murderer to the scene.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A coroner finds telltale clues on the badly burned body of a murder victim, sending police in pursuit of a couple of killers.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A brilliant young architect became ill and died just before she was to testify in a criminal trial. The autopsy revealed shed been poisoned with arsenic. Investigators had to determine which person who knew her had a motive for murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When more than 700 Oregonians contracted food poisoning from a unique strain of salmonella in 1984, investigators uncovered a secret plot to influence local elections.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The body of 16-year-old Leanne Tiernan was discovered nine months after she disappeared. Forensic scientists found clues that painted a virtual portrait of her killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A Colorado hunter is the victim of a well-planned crime. Investigators suspect two weapons and two killers.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: An obstetrician returned home from the hospital and found his wife on the bathroom floor. She was covered with blood and not breathing. He tried unsuccessfully to revive her, staining his clothes with her blood in the process, and then he called 911.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: For six years, a serial killer prowled NYC. He wrote letters to police indicating he would kill twelve people.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Discovering that an assault suspect is left-handed is crucial to a police investigation dating back 16 years.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When two women from the same town were murdered in the same way, police feared a serial killer was on the loose. At first they thought the victims had nothing in common until they found tiny clues linking them to the same man.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A man disappears one year to the day after beginning an affair with his friends wife. 15 years later, with the help of a metal detector, police find evidence that would prove what had happened and who was responsible.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman is shot to death just one day before she is to testify against the man accused of robbing her.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A go-go dancer told her family she needed to get away for a while and then she simply disappeared. Investigators were suspicious, because she took neither her car nor her clothes. 20 years later, her family received a call that changed everything.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman who suffered from mental illness is found dead. Was it due to natural causes, suicide or murder?

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman convicted of killing her mother in a car fire is granted a new trial. An expert witness has a different opinion as to how the fire started and, if proven, would clear the woman of any culpability.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: While investigating an apparent overdose suicide, detectives recover incriminating files from a computer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1993, the Amtrak Railroad experienced the deadliest train crash in United States history when the Sunset Limited derailed while crossing Alabamas Big Bayou Canot bridge.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When the body of a young woman is found under an isolated highway ramp, a unique fiber on the victims clothing leads San Diego police straight to the most unlikely of killers.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a woman disappeared without a trace, there were two possible explanations: kidnapping or murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The disappearance of Philadelphia athlete Aimee is investigated after her car is found on the roadside.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Bombings are difficult to solve, because the perpetrator isnt usually at the scene, and the evidence goes up in smoke. In this case pieces of plastic the size of grains of sand hold the key to a mans murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A two-man shrimp boat sinks when a fast-moving, violent storm strikes the Louisiana coast. The captain drowns, but the deckhand is rescued fourteen hours later. The crewman is hailed as a hero - until the captains body is discovered.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The murders of an elderly couple leave police stumped until, two years later, they receive a major break.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a serial killer was terrorizing the city of St. Louis, the FBI didnt need lab tests, fingerprints or any of the usual methods. All they needed was a computer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The investigation into the kidnapping and rape of an 18-year-old Ohio woman is aided when the victim returns hours after the incident occurred. With her help, the police are able to track the assailant to his front door.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Investigators sift through the ashes of a fire which killed a 40-year-old woman. The fire appears to have been started by an unattended cigarette. On closer look, forensic scientists discover the cause was far more complicated.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When an 11-year-old girl disappeared from a small town in a remote area of Alaska, investigators wondered if shed been attacked by a bear or become lost in the dense woods.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: On the way to Yosemite National Park, a car carrying three Secret Service agents collided with another car.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: An Alaskan police officer finds a womans body while on routine patrol of a public park. During the autopsy, the medical examiner preserves the portion of her rib cage which sustained the fatal wound.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A mother of two young children was found dead in her bedroom. Her death was ruled a suicide.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1991, a high school girl vanished after attending a party. The prime suspect had two alibi witnesses for the night she disappeared. A solid alibi can often overcome circumstantial evidence, but forensic evidence is another matter.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When Chris Ochoa confessed to the 1988 rape and murder of Nancy DePriest, the case was closed. 8 years later, Achim Marino confessed to the same crime. Can DNA evidence identify the real perpetrator?

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In the case of the Center City Rapist and the murder of Shannon Schieber, Philadelphia authorities use an anonymous letter and geographic profiling to hone in on a suspect.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY makes its debut in Turkey with GLORY 6: Istanbul. The main event features a super fight between Gokhan Saki against Daniel Ghiță. The event features 14 more fights with the likes of Joseph Valtellini, Filip Verlinden, Nieky Holzken, and Fabiano Cyclone among others.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Over the course of a year, twelve of the best GLORY featherweights will compete opposite twelve of the best RISE featherweights in a series of knockout bouts until one fighter becomes the Last Featherweight Standing.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E07 GLORY 102 Featherweight Grand Prix
programme.desc: Four more will punch their tickets into the next round as GLORY and RISE search for the baddest featherweight on the planet in this year long tournament. On the GLORY side, top ranked German Polish fighter Denis Wosik (40-9-1, 9 KO) takes on Thai veteran Suarek (107-40-11, 39 KO) and Italy’s Achraf Aasila (53-13, 13 KO) meets France’s Lounis Saing (19-4-1, 12 KO). Meanwhile on the RISE side of the bracket, Japan’s Yutaro Asahi (17-9, 4 KO) clashes with Spain’s Eduardo Catalin (17-3-1) and top Japanese prospect Yura Kono (15-1, 7 KO) goes up against China’s Dexiang Kong (35-10). In addition to the Last Featherweight Standing matchups, Shiro Matsumoto (53-17-4, 18 KO) defends his RISE...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 103: Last Heavyweight Standing main event features Levi Rigters (19-3, 9 KO) colliding with Jamal Ben Saddik (38-10, 29 KO) to see who moves on in the tournament. Among the other names taking part in Phase Two are Nabil Khachab (29-6-1, 4 KO), Iancu Ionut (31-11, 13 KO), Rade Opacic (21-7, 16 KO), Milos Cvjeticanin (13-4, 9 KO), Sofian Laidouni (39-5-1, 20 KO), and many more. In addition, Chico Kwasi (44-5-2, 23 KO) will defend his GLORY welterweight world title against Mehdi Ait El Hadj (35-4-2, 8 KO), Mory Kromah (34-3-1, 20 KO) returns and takes on Cristian Ristea (44-26, 13 KO) in a heavyweight match-up outside the tournament, and Tayfun Ozcan (88-11-3, 28 KO) clashes with rival...

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: The country has become a popular holiday destination for tourists from the UK, and it also has plenty to offer when it comes to carp fishing as well.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: Ali Hamidi is joined by friends Tom Dove and Neil Spooner as they embark upon a quest to northern Africa in pursuit of the big carp which they have heard about.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: Carp fishing definitely isnt something that you would immediately associate with a country that is better known for its stunning beaches, fragrant food and full moon parties.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: Every year thousands of British carp anglers travel across the English Channel with their mates to partake in a carp fishing holiday.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: The Balkans have made a remarkable recovery considering how recently they were a war-torn part of the world, and now attract large numbers of tourists each year.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: The Extremadura region was where the Romans first introduced carp to Spain, and this rugged area now has a reputation for producing some massive ones from the huge lakes.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: Croatia has emerged as probably the best place in the world to go and catch a huge carp and will soon be producing fish in excess of 100lb, likely to break the World record.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: The intrepid trio travel to Slovenia, a country none of them have ever been to before, to fish two very different waters.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: Ali Hamidi, Tom Dove and Neil Spooner travel to the iconic Lac Saint Cassien in France in search for monster Carp.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: When you think of carp fishing, Thailand certainly isnt a country that would be at the top of your list, or probably even in your list at all!

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: Hungary is home to some of the biggest king carp, including the current world record, and has produced several fish over the magical 100lb mark.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: In the land of windmills, tulips and of course vast networks of canals and other waterways, carp are plentiful, but finding some big ones isnt quite such an easy task.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: In a first for Monster Carp, and as a result of the Covid-19 travel restrictions, Ali, Neil and Tom stay at home in the UK, but that doesnt prevent them from going in search of some very large carp.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: Kicks off at a lake called Carces, as Ali, Tom and Neil embark on a Tour of France around the country in search of some of the huge carp that it is famous for.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: A visit to a complex of lakes, near Reims, which is fished by hundreds of anglers from the UK each year and is one of the most popular holiday venues in the country - Crete Lakes.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: A picturesque lake in the middle of forest land, a couple of hours drive from Paris, which is known as Iles3 and is home to some very special common carp.

programme.title: The Last Traitor
programme.desc: Ned Carter is waiting with a bunch of guests for his bride. When they notice there are exactly 13 people at the table, an unlucky number, some think its an evil omen.

programme.title: Pancho Villa
programme.desc: A double-cross in an arms deal prompts Mexican revolutionary Pancho Villa to raid a US Army weapons depot in Columbus, New Mexico.

programme.title: Duel in the Sun
programme.desc: After her father is executed, Pearl Chavez moves in with distant relatives in Texas. While Laura Belle and Jesse welcome her, the ranch’s patriarch despises her, and rebellious son Lewt becomes dangerously obsessed. As Pearl is torn between desire and danger, family tensions explode around her.

programme.title: Scalps
programme.desc: The commander of a Texan fort in the Civil War refuses to surrender to the Northerners, and tries to buy the local Indian tribe chiefs daughter. The sage man refuses, and the Southerners massacre the tribe and abduct the young squaw anyway. The noble squaw manages to escape, and hides out with a rough rancher, who dislikes Indians, but hates the Southerners more. The odd couple joins forces, and tactics, to exert ultimate vengeance on the men at the fort.

programme.title: A Minute to Pray, a Second to Die
programme.desc: In Tuscola, New Mexico, the Governor offers amnesty papers to all outlaws but gunfighter Clay McCords appearance triggers a violent confrontation between the local marshal, McCord, and other outlaws

programme.title: Tequila Joe
programme.desc: A young deputy tries to sober and revitalize a washed up, alcoholic sheriff to take down a pair of warring gangs of criminals in the Old West.

programme.title: Go with God, Gringo
programme.desc: Framed for his brother’s murder by the Cris brothers, Gringo lands in prison with a friend. When the real killers escape and abduct Carmen, he must survive daring adventures to prove his innocence and rescue her.

programme.title: Mackenzies Raiders EP05-08
programme.desc: Colonel Mackenzie, commander of the 4th Cavalry Regiment at Fort Clark near Brackettville in Kinney County in southwest Texas during the 1870s, receives secret orders from President Ulysses S. Grant and Secretary of War William W. Belknap to stop bandits from crossing the Rio Grande into the United States, or from returning to Mexico.

programme.title: Degueyo English
programme.desc: When Ramons bandits storm Danger City for rumored treasure, they slaughter or capture the men, leaving only women and children to face a ruthless "Deguello" if the money isn’t found. Four determined men, already hunting Ramon, join forces to help the town defend itself.

programme.title: Dig Your Grave Friend... Sabatas Coming
programme.desc: Steve McGowan returns from the Civil War to find his father murdered by the ruthless landowner Miller. Seeking revenge, Steve joins forces with the bandit Pompero. Things take a turn when they capture Helen, Millers fiancee. With the deadly gunslinger Sabata now hunting them, alliances are tested, and the fight for justice intensifies.

programme.title: Bonanza Compilation Episodes 37, 38, 39
programme.desc: The Wild West adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their Nevada ranch while helping the surrounding community.

programme.title: A Coffin for the Sheriff
programme.desc: Spaghetti Western icon Anthony Steffen stars as Shenandoah, a mysterious man who joins a ruthless band of highwaymen after overcoming an almost impossible and death-defying initiation.

programme.title: Three Bullets ... For a Long Gun
programme.desc: Nobody knows his true name, but everybody knows he is the Major, and that when he wants something, he gets it.

programme.title: Bakers Hawk
programme.desc: When a young boy nurses an injured hawk back to health, he gains newfound courage and confidence on his own.

programme.title: Call of the Forest
programme.desc: Bob Brand is looking for a lost gold mine. Storm Cloud makes friends with Bobs son Bobby and to repay Bob for the help he gave the Indians, he gives a map locating the mine to the boy.

programme.title: Something Big
programme.desc: A man kidnaps the wife of a cavalry commander in order to exchange her for a Gatling gun thats being sold by a gun runner.

programme.title: White Apache
programme.desc: Outlaws attack a band of settlers and kill everyone except a pregnant woman whos rescued by a band of Indians. The woman dies giving birth but Chief White Bear adopts her male baby, naming him "Shining Sky," and raising him as brother to his own son, Black Wolf.

programme.title: Apache Rifles
programme.desc: In 1879 Arizona, Captain Jeff Stanton leads a cavalry unit to return the Mescalero Apaches to their reservation after attacks on settlers. Capturing the chiefs son, Stanton negotiates a fragile truce, but greedy townsfolk plot to break it. As Stanton is replaced by a harsher commander, tensions rise, leading to disastrous consequences for both sides.

programme.title: God Is My Colt
programme.desc: A Army agent goes undercover to clean up corrupt Langford City full of Mexican outlaws.

programme.title: The Cry of the Black Wolves
programme.desc: Halfwit Indian Akaena promises a fictitious treasure to anyone who takes her down south where the sun always shines.

programme.title: Kill Johnny Ringo!
programme.desc: Texas Ranger Johnny Ringo hunts a counterfeiting ring but gets entangled in a love triangle involving crime boss Jackson, rancher Ray Scott, and saloon singer Annie. With tensions rising, Ringo must convince Ray to testify, but betrayal looms as the true mastermind - Ringo’s own partner, the sheriff - is revealed.

programme.title: Heroes of Fort Worth
programme.desc: During the Civil War, a group of confederate soldiers with the help of Apache Indians, try to defeat a Union fort, while trying to gain support from Emperor Maximillian of Mexico.

programme.title: Run, Man, Run
programme.desc: Several competing groups and mavericks (including the lead character Cuchillo) are hunting a gold treasure of $3,000,000. The gold was reserved for the Mexican revolution.

programme.title: The Over the Hill Gang
programme.desc: A retired Texas Ranger and his three aging pals are hired to clean up a lawless town.

programme.title: Bonanza Compilation Episodes 40, 41, 42
programme.desc: The Wild West adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their Nevada ranch while helping the surrounding community.

programme.title: Ramon the Mexican
programme.desc: Ramon avenges his brothers murder and kills the Baxter Family.

programme.title: Custer of the West
programme.desc: George Armstrong Custers love of the heroic traditions of the Calvary and his distaste with the coming of industrialization leads him to his destiny at the Little Big Horn.

programme.title: Santa Fe Passage
programme.desc: A disgraced Indian scout and his partner are hired to escort a wagonload of guns through Indian territory.

programme.title: Fat Brothers of Trinity
programme.desc: The bizarre adventures of the three gunmen Western grosser, next to a delicate young.

programme.title: LIVEFEED
programme.desc: A live experience featuring the busy kitchen staff of El Camino, a popular Mexican restaurant

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Japanese food inspired by other cultures
programme.desc: Chef and culinary instructor Hana Etsuko Dethlefsen shows us Japanese cuisine inspired by other cultures with a pork and tofu dish, sesame chicken salad, breaded pork cutlet, and even a French crepe.

programme.title: Up the Dish
programme.desc: Take a trip around the world in this episode of Up the Dish! Host Missy Hui hits the Great Wall running - her Chinese Fried Rice recipe is a classic complete with crispy bacon, crunchy onions and savoury scallions. Then, Poppy Sandler sets off for the Land of the Rising Sun with Crispy Sushi Rice and Spicy Tuna; sriracha mayo seasons the sushi-grade tuna and sticky short-grain rice cakes are fried (fried rice anyone?) to a beautiful golden-brown. Micah Trainors Gorgonzola-Chive Arancini puts a Sicilian spin on frying rice - panko-crusted arborio is creamy and flavourful with blue cheese and chives for this ultra-indulgent Italian redux. Rice Papad with Turkey Tikka Masala is Tiera...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Noodles are the star ingredients when chef Hana Etsuko Dethlefsen cooks up somen noodles with dipping sauce, ramen salad, a fried noodle dish, and a one-pot delight.

programme.title: Up the Dish
programme.desc: Get ready for a not-so-raw deal in this episode of Up the Dish! Host Poppy Sandler sets things in motion and slices up a simple, elegant Sashimi with tangy Ponzu and tart Wasabi Mayo on the side. Missy Hui gets carnivorous with Lamb Carpaccio and Dukkah - delicate raw lamb and a Middle Eastern-style dip served with some delicious pita! But wait, whats a vegetarian to do with all this meat? Tiera Singhs got the answer - island-style Poke Bowls, with fruit instead of fish. Refreshing watermelon is marinated in a savoury, soy-based sauce and served with rice. For the finale, Micah Trainor Up(s) the Dish with her Scallop Tartare and Beet Chips, combining raw scallops with ultra-decadent...

programme.title: Lets Brunch
programme.desc: Champagne, lobster, and homemade scones, oh my! Host Vanessa Gianfrancesco cooks up an indulgent and luxurious brunch thats perfect for those fabulous mid-mornings.

programme.title: Lets Brunch
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Pick Up Your Brunch
programme.desc: Skip the utensils and gather for chef Vanessas pick up your brunch! Featuring Sticky Pull-Apart Praline Bread and an extra cheesy Monte Cristo Sandwich.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: First stop on Chef Spencers Spanish flavour tour? Habanero Char-Grilled Octopus - warmed up with punchy chilies and balanced with a sweet and tangy sherry vinaigrette. Next, Spencer stuffs whole sea bass with citrus and herbs, gives it the grill treatment and then tops it with olive oil blistered cherry tomatoes. The rotisserie does the heavy lifting for Mr. Watts whole roast chicken - spiked with bright Spanish flavours like Spanish chilies and smoked paprika, slow cooked and served extra juicy. Finally, Spencer prepares a classic Spanish recipe: Paella. Loaded saffron rice, piled high with chorizo, veggies, and shellfish. Of course, Spencers Paella is made in the Spanish tradition;...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 The Butter Did It
programme.desc: Its all about beautiful butter in this episode of Watts on the Grill! First up, entertaining host Spencer fires tosses clams in velvety butter, zesty garlic and earthy spices to make his Clams with Garlic Paprika Butter. Next up is a traditional Indian recipe, but done on the grill - Butter Chicken! All the butter chicken flavours we love are infused in the marinade, before getting crisped up on the fiery grill - the result is both classic and completely new! Scallops are next, grilled and served with a mouth-watering caper-raisin butter. For his final recipe; Chef Watts prepares a rich and juicy grilled Rib Steak topped with a decadent port wine compound butter. Oh, what a butter-loving...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Weve all cooked with salt. But what about ON salt. Thats right, chef Spencer Watts blows our minds with his seared scallops that are cooked on a Himalayan pink salt block. His next recipe uses a quick cure with Hawaiian black lava salt on swordfish steaks, then tops them with a gorgeous and refreshing grilled fruit salsa. Then, Spencer gets creative with Cured Duck Legs with Scallions, using a salt cure to intensify the flavours of duck leg before its cooked slow and low, then glazed with maple and soy. After cooking on salt, curing with salt, the only thing left is to cook INSIDE salt - Spencers Salt Crusted Prime Rib is a game changer, flavourful, bone-in beef that he seasons with a...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Chocolate on the barbecue? Thats right. Chef Spencer Watts kicks off this episode as he grills a crispy coconut-cacao crust and serves it with sweet chili dipping sauce. Chocolate is the not-so-secret ingredient in Spencers Grilled Chicken Mole. He grills the chicken legs smothered in the sweet-spicy-salty-nutty-creamy-chocolatey sauce, then finishes it by cooking it slow and low. Next, dark chocolate cocoa powder is in both the rub and the sauce for Chef Watts favourite pork rib recipe - Cocoa-rubbed Baby Back Ribs. For his final recipe, Spencer takes it to a sweet level with his Chocolate pizza made with chocolate ganache, grilled cherries, with barbeque- caramelized white chocolate...

programme.title: Blitz!
programme.desc: BLITZ! is an all-new cooking show! Imagine being next to Joe Friday as they cook their fav dishes!

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on spicy sauces! First up, a Cajun comeback sauce for soft-shelled crab! Next, a classic steakhouse mustard sauce and a ginger caramel sauce for ginger caramel apples!

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on wine sauces! First up, a classic veal marsala! Next, a white wine chicken gravy and a port sabayon with grapes!

programme.desc: Lazy and curmudgeonly chef and ex-Gusto writer Zach cooks one of his all-time favorite meals – Roast Chicken Dinner! While cooking, he tells aimless stories, cracks bad jokes, and berates Sydney, the beleaguered camera person.

programme.title: Flour Power
programme.desc: What should you do in a wild winter blizzard? Bake! Host Jessica McGovern makes sweet winter treats like an extravagant Gingerbread Chalet.

programme.title: Bring On The Karbs
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Bar Food Done Good
programme.desc: Chefs Erica and Josh Karbelnik go head-to-head to see who can come up with the most tantalizing bar bites! Josh makes fried halloumi, whitefish tartar, and a salad based on a drink, while Erica prepares beef tartare, escargot, and sliders!

programme.title: Generation Cooks
programme.desc: Aspiring kid Chefs make avocado toast and tacos, Liam whips up an easy pantry pasta, while Jae-Anthony and his father Wendell make a favorite one pot meal!

programme.title: Bonacinis Italy
programme.desc: Delving into the cold mountainous region of Valle DAosta, Celebrity chef Michael Bonacini whips up a meal of four hearty dishes that are sure to warm up any chilly day. First up is Michaels antipasto of Wild Mushrooms and Lardo on Rye. Coated with rich, earthy mushrooms, buttery fontina cheese, and savoury cured pork, this decadent dish highlights a combination of iconic flavours from Valle DAosta. Next up is a twist on traditional pasta with Valle DAostas unique Chestnut Fettucine topped with Sweet Pork and Earthy Cabbage. The secret to this dish? Chestnut flour to create a denser, sweeter, and nuttier pasta. For his secondo, Michael turns to the pride of the region, Fontina cheese,...

programme.title: Spice Secrets
programme.desc: Every cook needs to learn their Mother Sauces before they can claim the title of Chef. Spice Secrets co-hosts Shahir Massoud and Jasmin Ibrahim are no different, though their sauce recipes sure are! First, a traditional Tomato Sauce re-examined as a Bucatini AllAmatriciana spiced with Quatre Épices! Next, a rich veal Demi-Glace spiced two different ways, served with veal chops and Roasted Mushrooms! Finally, a spin on a classic Bearnaise Sauce, replacing tarragon with Aniseed.

programme.title: Bonacinis Italy
programme.desc: From hearty inland crops to fresh food of the sea, the Venetian region covers it all. Host Michael Bonacini begins with the sea as he serves up an antipasto of succulent Soft Shell Crab. Michael pairs the crab with a Tangy Aioli made from sundried tomatoes, creating the perfect combination of crispy and creamy. Moving inland for his primo, Michael twists together two classic Venetian dishes to make a new favourite: Radicchio Risotto! With his secondo, Michael cooks up a light and creamy Pancetta-Wrapper Snapper with Pea Mash. Sweet and tender, this dish will melt in your mouth. Whether youre in the mood to share or feeling a little selfish, Michaels Giant Almond Crumb Biscuit covers it...

programme.title: A Bronx Tale

programme.title: 10 Items or Less
programme.desc: Oscar ja Golden Globe palkittu Morgan Freeman esittaa elokuvatahtea, joka suunnittelee valkokankaalle paluuta neljan vuoden poissaolon jalkeen. Harkitessaan roolia supermarketin paallikkona, han kay pienessa latino-marketissa Los Angelesin laitamilla. Siella han tapaa kipakan kassaneidin, Scarletin (Paz Vega, Spanglish – kaannoskukkasia, Puhu hanelle). Huomatessaan olevansa kaukana kotoaan, ilman puhelinta taikka ajoneuvoa, elokuvatahti hyvaksyy Scarletin tarjouksen kyydista takaisin ”sivilisaatioon”. Matkan varrella tama ulkoisesti niin erilainen pari loytaa yhteisen savelen, joka pysyvasti muuttaa heidan suhtautumistaan elamaan.

programme.title: Shes The Man
programme.desc: Viola Hastings (Amanda Bynes) kuulee kauhukseen, etta tyttojen futisjoukkue lopetetaan. Kun portti poikien joukkueeseen ei muuten aukea, Viola paattaa esiintya veljenaan Sebastianina, jonka oleskelu Lontoossa venahtaa. Mutta pojan rooli ei olekaan ihan helppo vetaa, etenkaan kun kamppiksena on sopo Duke (Channing Tatum), joka tosin on ihastunut kauniiseen Oliviaan (Laura Ramsey), joka puolestaan ihastuu herkkaan uuteen poikaan Sebastianiin... Elokuva perustuu kevytjuustoakin loysemmin Shakespearen Loppiaisaattoon.

programme.title: Seeking a Friend for the End of the World
programme.desc: Valtava asteroidi lahestyy Maata, ja viimeinen keino sen pysayttamiseksi on juuri epaonnistunut. Ihmiset reagoivat 21 paivan paasta koittavaan maailmanloppuun varsin kirjavilla teoilla. Vakuutusmyyja Dodgen ja naapurintytto Pennyn tiet kohtaavat mellakoiden yltyessa ja he paattavat auttaa toisiaan matkalla kohti viimeisia paamaariaan.

Kirjailija luuli kirjoittavansa tulevaisuudesta, mutta kirjoittikin menneisyydesta. Hanen romaanissaan juna ajaa silloin talloin vuoteen 2046. Jokaisella matkustajalla oli sama aikomus: elaa kadotetut muistonsa uudestaan. Sanottiin, etta vuonna 2046 mikaan ei ollut muuttunut. Kukaan ei tarkkaan tiennyt, oliko se totta, koska matkustajat eivat koskaan palanneet - paitsi yksi. Han oli siella mutta halusi lahtea pois.

programme.title: Kauas pilvet karkaavat
programme.desc: Kauas pilvet karkaavat kertoo helsinkilaispariskunnasta. Raitiovaununkuljettaja ja perinteikkaan ravintola Dubrovnikin hovimestari menettavat tyonsa, mutta eivat toivoaan Aki Kaurismaen (Le Havre) Suomi-trilogian ensimmaisessa osassa.

programme.title: Vieraampi kuin fiktio
programme.desc: Verohallinnon tarkastaja huomaa yhtakkia olevansa vain hanen kuulemansa kerronnan kohteena: kertomus, joka alkaa vaikuttaa hanen koko elamaansa; hanen tyostaan; hanen rakkautensa; hanen kuolemaansa.

programme.title: Promised Land
programme.desc: Intensiivisessa draamassa seurataan kahta high school -opiskelijaa, Hancockia ja Dannya, heidan valmistumisensa jalkeen. Hancock tyytyy cheerleader-tyttoystavansa kanssa keskiluokkaiseen keskinkertaisuuteen ja etaantyy Dannysta ja taman psykoottisesta vaimosta, Bevista.

programme.title: Im Not There
programme.desc: MIES. MUSIIKKI. LEGENDA. Nae Heath Ledgerin ja muiden tahtien loistavat roolisuoritukset. Im Not There on epatavallinen matka halki Bob Dylanin elaman. Kuusi eri nayttelijaa esittaa Dylania eri aikakausilla ja eri rooleissa julkisuuden henkilosta yksityiseen. Lopputuloksena on varikas muotokuva tasta julkisuutta karttelevasta amerikkalaisikonista. Runoilija, profeetta, lainsuojaton, teeskentelija, valovoimainen tahti, rocknroll -marttyyri, uskovainen - seitseman identiteettia, yksi elama, yhta lavea ja hurja kuin ajanjakso, jonka moottori se oli.

programme.title: Death At A Funeral
programme.desc: Danielin ja Robertin isan kuolema saattaa toraisan perheen yhteen suremaan vainajaa. Kun hautajaisiin ilmestyva mies uhkaa paljastaa vainajan jarkyttavan salaisuuden ellei saa rahaa, on veljesten keksittava jotain paastakseen kiristajasta eroon. Seremoniasta sukeutuu taysi kaaos, kun he yrittavat estaa uutisen kantautumisen saattovaen korviin.

programme.title: Kielletty Intohimo
programme.desc: Kun nuoren parin kotiin yritetaan murtautua, he soittavat poliisille, kuten kuka vain tekisi. Silloin he tapaavat losangelesilaispoliisi Pete Davisin, jonka huolehtivaisuus ihastuttaa. Han ottaa asiakseen taata pariskunnan turvallisuuden ja alkaa partioida heidan tontillaan. Mutta ystavallisyys muuttuu vahitellen kieroutuneeksi pakkomielteeksi, kun Davis tunkeutuu yha syvemmalle pariskunnan elamaan. Alkaa painajainen, jossa suojelijasta tulee saalistaja. Pariskunnan taytyy jotenkin paasta pakoon turvaverkkoa, josta on tullut heidan vihollisensa.

programme.title: On Aika Tappaa
programme.desc: Elokuvan ohjaaja on Joel Schumacher (Batman Forever, Paamies). Sandra Bullock, Samuel L. Jackson, Matchew McConaughey ja Kevin Spacey esittavat paaosia murhaoikeudenkaynnissa, joka nostaa pienen mississippilaiskaupungin rotujannitteet valokeilaan. Aktivistimarssien, Ku Kluz Klanin hirmuvallan, mediarummutuksen ja vakivaltaisten mellakoiden keskella kokematon, mutta idealistinen nuori asianajaja jarjestaa aj atuksia herattavan oikeussalitaistelun oikeuden puolesta. Loisteliaasseen nayttelijakaartiin kuuluvat myos Breda Fricker, Oliver Platt, CharlesS. Dutton, Ashley Judd, Patrick McGoohan, Chris Cooper ja seka Donald etta Kiefer Sutherland.

programme.title: Army of One
programme.desc: Matrix 4, Spartacus ja NCIS: New Orleansistakin tuttu Ellen Hollman elamansa roolissa henkihieveriin piestyna naisena, jonka kosto on armoton ja perinpohjainen. Nuori pariskunta lahtee telttailemaan Alabaman metsiin, mutta romanttinen irtiotto arjesta menee kammottavalla tavalla pieleen, kun he tormaavat vakivaltaiseen huumekartelliin. Kartellin miehet tappavat Brennerin aviomiehen Dillonin (Matt Passmore) ja jattavat Brennerin kuolemaan - tai ainakin luulivat jattavansa. Kaikkensa menettanyt Brenner lahtee kostoretkelle, jota kukaan ei osannut odottaa ja jolta yksikaan ei voi valttya. Rajahtavaa toimintaa, joka intensiteetillaan naulitsee katsojan penkkiin jo alkumetreilta!

programme.title: A Late Quartet
programme.desc: Kun maailmankuulun jousikvartetin rakastettu sellisti saa kuulla laakariltaan mullistavan diagnoosin, on koko ryhman tulevaisuus vaakalaudalla. Tukahdutetut tunteet, kilpailevat egot ja hallitsemattomat intohimot uhkaavat suistaa vuosien ystavyyden ja yhteistyon raiteiltaan. Valmistautuessaan 25. vuosipaivan juhlakonserttiinsa, joka saattaa hyvinkin jaada myos viimeiseksi, on toivo heidan maineensa sailymisesta kiinni yhteisista siteista ja musiikin voimasta. Beethovenin Jousikvartetto nro 14 cis-molli opus 131:n ymparille rakennettu A LATE QUARTET on koskettava kunnianosoitus kamarimusiikille ja New Yorkin kulttuurimaailmalle.

programme.title: Seeking a Friend for the End of the World
programme.desc: Valtava asteroidi lahestyy Maata, ja viimeinen keino sen pysayttamiseksi on juuri epaonnistunut. Ihmiset reagoivat 21 paivan paasta koittavaan maailmanloppuun varsin kirjavilla teoilla. Vakuutusmyyja Dodgen ja naapurintytto Pennyn tiet kohtaavat mellakoiden yltyessa ja he paattavat auttaa toisiaan matkalla kohti viimeisia paamaariaan.

programme.title: I Heart Huckabees
programme.desc: Albert Markovski, Open Spaces -yhdistyksen puheenjohtaja, on kokenut hammentavan sarjan sattumia, joiden tarkoitus askarruttaa hanta. Kahden eksistentiaalisen yksityisetsivan Bernard ja Vivian Jaffen avulla Albert tarkastelee elamaansa, ihmissuhteitaan ja konfliktiaan Brad Standiin, urallaan etenevan suositun tavarataloketjun Huckabeesin toimitusjohtajaan.

programme.title: Cypher
programme.desc: Yritysvakoilun hamarassa valtakunnassa kyllastynyt jokamies kompastuu petoksen verkkoon ja hanesta tulee tietamaton vakooja. Kun han navigoi petoksessa ja petoksessa, han tekee yhteistyota viettelevan arvoituksen kanssa paljastaakseen jarkyttavia totuuksia ja saadakseen takaisin identiteettinsa.

programme.title: My Week With Marilyn
programme.desc: Tositapahtumiin perustuva brittidraama kertoo Marilyn Monroen viikosta Englannissa, jossa han oli kuvaamassa elokuvaa "Prinssi ja revyytytto" hurmaten kaikki niin kameran edessa kuin takanakin. Colin Clarkin kahteen kirjaan perustuva brittidraama kertoo Marilyn Monroen ja Laurence Olivierin tahdittaman elokuvan Prinssi ja revyytytto (1957) synnysta. Tarina keskittyy viikkoon, jolloin Clark toimi Marilyn Monroen isantana Englannissa taman miehen Arthur Millerin poistuttua maasta.

programme.title: Promised Land
programme.desc: Intensiivisessa draamassa seurataan kahta high school -opiskelijaa, Hancockia ja Dannya, heidan valmistumisensa jalkeen. Hancock tyytyy cheerleader-tyttoystavansa kanssa keskiluokkaiseen keskinkertaisuuteen ja etaantyy Dannysta ja taman psykoottisesta vaimosta, Bevista.

Kirjailija luuli kirjoittavansa tulevaisuudesta, mutta kirjoittikin menneisyydesta. Hanen romaanissaan juna ajaa silloin talloin vuoteen 2046. Jokaisella matkustajalla oli sama aikomus: elaa kadotetut muistonsa uudestaan. Sanottiin, etta vuonna 2046 mikaan ei ollut muuttunut. Kukaan ei tarkkaan tiennyt, oliko se totta, koska matkustajat eivat koskaan palanneet - paitsi yksi. Han oli siella mutta halusi lahtea pois.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: Vuonna 1961 Neuvostoliiton ensimmainen ydinsukellusvene lahtee ensimmaiselle matkalleen Pohjois-Atlantille. Mutta sukellusvene ei toimi optimaalisesti, ja koska ydinreaktorissa ilmenee ongelmia, silla on katastrofaaliset seuraukset miehistoon. Miehiston on taisteltava yhdessa ydinkatastrofin valttamiseksi, joka on seka hengenvaarallinen etta voi aloittaa uuden maailmansodan suurvaltojen valilla.

programme.title: Cha Cha Cha
programme.desc: Siltojen alla asusteleva alkoholisti Matti (Matti Pellonpaa) on saamassa Amerikan tadiltaan huomattavan perinnon, mutta miehen tulisi olla edustuskelpoinen tadin vierailun ajan. Matti kertoo tilanteesta autokauppiaana tyoskentelevalle ystavalleen, joka ehdottaa korvausta vastaan roolien vaihtoa.

programme.title: A Bronx Tale
programme.desc: Lorenzo Anello on amerikanitalialainen bussikuski Bronxin esikaupungissa New Yorkissa. Hanella on vaimo Rosina ja poika Calogero. Eraana paivana Calogero joutuu silminnakijaksi murhaan kotitalonsa edessa.

programme.title: Puhdistaja (Walking Tall)
programme.desc: Kun on kyse lain noudattamisesta, yksi mies voi tehda eron! Toimintatahti Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson ei ota vankeja taistellessaan oikeuden puolesta ja murskatessaan korruptiota tassa tarinassa miehesta, joka ottaa kantaa… ja ottaa kaupunkinsa takaisin!

programme.title: Kielletty Intohimo
programme.desc: Kun nuoren parin kotiin yritetaan murtautua, he soittavat poliisille, kuten kuka vain tekisi. Silloin he tapaavat losangelesilaispoliisi Pete Davisin, jonka huolehtivaisuus ihastuttaa. Han ottaa asiakseen taata pariskunnan turvallisuuden ja alkaa partioida heidan tontillaan. Mutta ystavallisyys muuttuu vahitellen kieroutuneeksi pakkomielteeksi, kun Davis tunkeutuu yha syvemmalle pariskunnan elamaan. Alkaa painajainen, jossa suojelijasta tulee saalistaja. Pariskunnan taytyy jotenkin paasta pakoon turvaverkkoa, josta on tullut heidan vihollisensa.

programme.title: A Little Bit Of Heaven
programme.desc: Kate Hudson on taydellinen roolissaan sateilevan kauniina Marleyna, nuorena uranaisena, joka sairastuu yllattaen syopaan. Marley on oikea flirttailija, joka ei ole koskaan ollut rakastunut, mutta kun laakarin roolissa on vastustamaton Gael García Bernal, olisiko rakkaus kuitenkin laakkeista paras?

programme.title: I Survived
programme.desc: A California man taken hostage by Marxist rebels in Colombia survives.
