programme.title: Fight to Survive
programme.desc: Ed Rosenthal set out for a short hike in Joshua Tree National Park, but in the heat of the day he became turned around and lost. His six-day ordeal of survival in blazing temperatures with no food or water is nothing short of miraculous.

programme.title: Do wild animals still exist ? - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 2 - Do wild animals still exist ? - Part 2
programme.desc: Yann Arthus-Bertrand surprises us with preserved landscapes. And sometimes even with vast spaces where mans imprint remains invisible. Yann Arthus-Bertrand continues his world tour in favour of the protection of the environment and wildlife. From the tip of the African continent, he decides to take down the fences to let the animals roam freely, then he takes us to Cambodia to see if the tigers will disappear. Then we head to London to follow the chimpanzee or to France to study and save the bees.

programme.title: Self-massage for the feet
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Audio advices - Season 6 - Self-massage for the feet

programme.title: Love and open heart
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Audio advices - Season 5 - Love and open heart
programme.desc: The aim of this session is to help you open up to others by visualizing those times in the past when others opened up to you. You will focus on your past and think only about the good, positive moments. Youll be guided throughout the entire exercise so that in the end, youll be able to learn from your past experience and open up to others in a similar way.

programme.title: Greece, Euphoria Retreat
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Reset - Season 1 - Greece, Euphoria Retreat
programme.desc: In this episode of Reset, embark on a transformative journey to Euphoria Retreat.A mystical place offering a holistic approach to well-being aimed at restoring balance between body, mind and soul.After a long struggle with illness, its founder embarked on a personal quest to find balance. An in-depth reflection which resulted in the creation of a place where one could share and transmit this method of well-being. Euphoria Retreat is a clever blend of Taoist and Hellenic philosophy based on the symbolism of the five elements: water, wood, fire, earth and metal. Ancestral wisdom and scientific advances offer a transformative immersion in self-discovery. The tools developed by Euphoria...

programme.title: Italy, Palazzo Fiuggi
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Reset - Season 1 - Italy, Palazzo Fiuggi
programme.desc: In this episode of Reset we discover Palazzo Fiuggi, a haven of well-being located in the heart of the natural springs of Fiuggi, famous for their purifying and healing powers.The Palazzo was born from the vision of a science and health enthusiast. This historic place of well-being offers exclusive medical-scientific therapies combining the healing properties of water with advances in Western medicine and alternative medicines. Upon arrival, a team of specialists carries out a targeted diagnosis to create a personalized protocol, rebalancing the mind, body and soul, with a simple promise: offering a longer and better-lived life.A constantly evolving method, between ancestral wisdom and...

programme.title: Poultry on the menu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - Poultry on the menu
programme.desc: Julie heads for Burgundy to discover ancient breeds of poultry reintroduced to France thanks to the work of breeder Fred Menager. Well then move on to Auvergne to discover how the famous Label Rouge is awarded and the role of certifying bodies ... because its important to know what ends up on our plates. Julie also travels to the Drôme to cook guinea fowl, before heading to the Perigord to prepare a turkey stew. Julie will then head back up towards the center to discover an amazing fly maker who uses rooster feathers!

programme.title: Escape
programme.desc: Watch beautiful landscapes from all over the world !

programme.title: Floating Yoga
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Floating Yoga
programme.desc: Just Float, this is the latest yoga trend and mantra for an relaxed mind. As you enter a fully soundproof studio and float in vats filled with epson salts, you will disconnect from the urban buzz. That is Val’s promise as she takes us to experience this funny trend. With a sain mind comes a sain body: it’s time to head to Clover Juice, the most famous juice address in Los Angeles. As we make our way through Clover’s kitchen, we discover this way of life, mix and learn more on these beverage’s benefits.

programme.title: Animal Farm
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Animal Farm
programme.desc: In this episode, we will go to a ranch, which is a real sanctuary for animals. The animals are king and the llama is the star. This center takes in animals to give them a safer and happier life in a beautiful setting. Then Val will participate in a Namastday Yoga session, another trend in yoga involving ropes hanging from the ceiling, acrobatic poses and great flexibility.

programme.title: Planting vegetables in the fall
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My First Garden - Season 1 - Planting vegetables in the fall
programme.desc: We meet in the market garden of Romainville, to continue installing vegetables in the vegetable garden. Yes, it is possible, even in autumn. Because if its true that most vegetables are planted in spring or summer, some varieties can be planted in early autumn and are fast-growing, which will allow you to harvest them in late autumn or early winter. Lets get started! Were going to plant winter spinach together and well show you a little trick you need to know to harvest it properly.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Minute Bowl - Season 1 - Rainbow bowl
programme.desc: In this episode, we put some color on your plate by preparing a rainbow bowl. For this youll need quinoa, carrot, avocado, cucumber, radish, chioggia beet, pomegranate and buckwheat seeds, and mint. This bowl is composed by different colored vegetables which allows us to fill up with nutrients, minerals and vitamins. The look of a nice dish makes us secrete more digestive enzymes.

programme.title: Claire
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 3 - Claire
programme.desc: One woman’s personal mission to reduce her household rubbish turned into a passion that gave birth to Southeast Asia’s first Zero-Waste Bulk Food shop. Claire is a driven and successful mother of three who turned away from her corporate job to channel her business-savvy into reducing our impact on the environment and contributing to the improvement of her local community.

programme.title: Zaira (Argentina)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Zaira (Argentina)
programme.desc: For a long time Zaira let herself be defined solely as a survivor of the traumatic sexual assault that marked her life. In her healing search, she left behind the busy city life and moved to seek solace in the mountains of Mendoza. It is among these magnificent peaks that Zaira found peace within herself and harmony with her surroundings. Now, eager to help others heal, she is the leader of a trekking initiative that doubles as a support group for other women who are victims of sexual aggression.

programme.title: Ile (Argentina)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Ile (Argentina)
programme.desc: Ileana studied business and worked long hours indoors for a multinational logistics company. Her love for dance and desire for movement drove her to quit her corporate life and begin a new chapter as a fitness trainer. Quickly exhausting the traditional methods available at her local gyms, she began to create innovative and groundbreaking exercise methods of her own. Her goal: to empower women by making them feel strong and feminine at the same time.

programme.title: So the great rivers may live - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 2 - So the great rivers may live - Part 1
programme.desc: Water and its beauty, water and its power, water and its fragility... the water we all need is becoming scarce, through our own fault. Some rivers are dry, others are diverted, cut off by dams, others are simply polluted, and this for decades. We will discover how humans transformed the nature in Argentina, then in China and its disproportionate Three Gorges Dam. We will also go in Botswana with the Okavango, this unique river which flows into a desert forming the famous Okavango Delta. Vu du Ciel makes you discover once again another world, magnificent but threatened.

programme.title: Differential relaxation
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Audio advices - Season 5 - Differential relaxation
programme.desc: This exercise helps you develop what we call differential relaxation. The aim is to learn to relax the entire body except the parts necessary to the proper development of an action. For example, when youre working in the office, your back and your arms are often extremely contracted when really only your eyes and hands are involved in the task.

programme.title: France, Le Bruit de leau
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Reset - Season 1 - France, Le Bruit de leau
programme.desc: In this episode of Reset, we take you to “Le Bruit de leau”, an ecolodge nestled in the heart of the Baie de Somme nature reserve, in France. In the middle of nature, discover a place of absolute serenity inspired by the Japanese lifestyle and the travels of a great reporter, its founder.The intimate atmosphere that reigns at Le Bruit de leau (The Sound of Water) envelops you in a soothing calm, creating a cocoon made for relaxation and personal rejuvenation.This ecolodge allows us to cultivate awareness of the present moment and to open up to a fulfilling perception of our environment. Le Bruit de leau opens the doors to a transformative experience, where beauty of the natural...

programme.title: Sri Lanka, Santani
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Reset - Season 1 - Sri Lanka, Santani
programme.desc: In this episode of Reset, we fly to Sri Lanka to discover an old tea plantation transformed into a sumptuous refuge: Santani.In order to find an alternative to the stress of urban life, the hotel offers a modern approach to Ayurveda. This traditional Indian medicine aims to establish a balance between the individual and the world around them. Thanks to the development of a personalized program, each visitor is invited to find harmony within this restorative sanctuary.Santani was created by a Sri Lankan eager to preserve our physical and spiritual well-being in a peaceful and healthy place to reconnect with the world differently. Lets discover a holistic approach to health, including...

programme.title: The flavors of chocolate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - The flavors of chocolate
programme.desc: Today, the gluttons should not be disappointed since chocolate is in the spotlight. Discovered by the Mayans 2500 years ago and then more widely by the Aztecs, chocolate is today one of the favorite products in the world. And make no mistake about it: just as the kitchen has its great chefs, chocolate also has its great chocolatiers.As for recipes, Julie will introduce you to a cake that is only made in Saint Émilien and which combines chocolate with macarons, before heading to the Basque Country for a dessert to spice you up. We will then climb up the mountain to meet a Swiss cook. Finally, you will see that chocolate has several surprises in store for us: it has many virtues and is...

programme.title: Hotel on Pacific
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Hotel on Pacific
programme.desc: Val takes us to one of the most beautiful hotels in California: The Belmont Hotel! Much more than a hotel, this place is a natural haven where everything is made to relax while overlooking the Pacific. While relaxation is key, we also seek adventures, don’t we? While in this dream setting, we will practice yoga among the turtles, walk around the vertical and organic garden with the Chef and treat ourselves with a massage with essential oils coming directly from the garden.

programme.title: Surfing and Vineyards
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Surfing and Vineyards
programme.desc: Yoga and Surf are two corner stones of the Californian spirit. In this episode, the best of both worlds meets as Val shares a surf session with a local champion from Malibu! What about the surfing outfit ? No need for it, there is a yoga mat. Let’s head to Ojai, in the middle of a vineyards, and joint the "Topa Wines" group for a yoga session at the sunset. Together, we will enjoy the "Pink moment": the time when Ojai’s mountains turn pink and your mind is blown away.

programme.title: Repotting an indoor plant
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My First Garden - Season 1 - Repotting an indoor plant
programme.desc: We meet in the market garden of Romainville to learn how to take good care of our indoor plants. The plants that grow in our houses and flats are grown in pots. And when we buy a new plant, it is very important to repot it. The plants we buy come in pots that are often too small for them to grow well. Thats why you put it in a bigger pot.

programme.title: Agostina (Argentina)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Agostina (Argentina)
programme.desc: When Agostina’s mother was diagnosed with breast cancer, she began seeking out soft natural fabrics that would not irritate her mother’s sensitive skin. She found it almost impossible to find the right materials, so she decided to make her own. Research led her to bamboo fibers and she realised she could make a positive impact on the environment, while developing sustainable and ethical fashion.

programme.title: Solenn (Nantes)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Solenn (Nantes)
programme.desc: A former school teacher reinvents herself when she discovers a passion for sharing other women’s stories. Always inspired by the journeys of strong women, Solenn began a blog to celebrate the women in her community. Solenn’s energy and passion fueled a dream of starting her own magazine. Thanks to a successful crowdfunding campaign, this dream blossomed into a professional career in journalism and she launched a print mook (magazine and book) called Etonnantes. Etonnantes features interviews of women of all backgrounds, celebrating their diversity and success in each field.

programme.title: Sophie (Nantes)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Sophie (Nantes)
programme.desc: Always an artist at heart, Sophie grew up in the countryside amongst nature and farm animals. Her love for creating art while respecting nature turned into a drive to seek out sustainable vegetable dyes.Today, her artwork and craft are intertwined as she makes beautiful prints and motifs that she colours with natural dyes, prepared from handpicked variety of flowers and plants that turn into stunning creations.

programme.title: So the great rivers may live - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 2 - So the great rivers may live - Part 2
programme.desc: Yann Arthus-Bertrand thus continues his world tour and his inventory of the planet with the great rivers that suffer from mans excesses as a common thread. " So the great rivers may live" is the discovery of places, men and women who are fighting so that our waterways simply have their place on Earth. Thanks to his genius, man is correcting his mistakes: the Aral Sea, which once disappeared, is coming back. In New York, millions of people have drinking water thanks to the natural virtues of the forest.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Audio advices - Season 5 - Joint relaxation
programme.desc: The joints are the first parts of the body to react badly to stress, therefore it is essential to relax and relieve them as often as possible. Some ankle and knee rotations, combined with calm, controlled breathing will allow you to soothe your joints. With a few simple, well-targeted exercises, this session will bring you deep relaxation.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Audio advices - Season 1 - Exercises to activate the muscles

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Audio advices - Season 6 - Self-massage for the back and shoulder
programme.desc: Bad posture and sagging shoulders are behaviors which can cause our body to suffer. MyZen TV offers a series of four exercises to massage your own back and shoulders. Practicing these simple and effective exercises can easily allow you to relax.

programme.desc: Watch beautiful landscapes from all over the world !

programme.title: Of Forests and Men - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 2 - Of Forests and Men - Part 2
programme.desc: The call of the Forest is about discovering places but above all it is about meeting those who protect this priceless heritage. Forests are essential to mankind. They capture CO2, promote the formation of clouds and therefore rain, protect the soil from erosion and provide a habitat for wildlife. From Madagascar, to France, to Cameroon, or even Eritrea, Yann Arthus-Bertrand sets out to discover the most beautiful forests, those who live in them, those who protect them and those who live off them.

programme.title: The cheese menu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - The cheese menu
programme.desc: Today, Julie sets on the roads of France to talk about an essential product on French tables: cheese. More than a gourmet craze, more than an end-of-meal treat, cheese is associated with French gastronomy, and is also recognized as Intangible Cultural Heritage by UNESCO. With nearly 1,000 varieties (soft cheeses, cooked, blue-veined, pressed cheeses…), the French are the biggest consumers of cheese in the world!

programme.title: Escape
programme.desc: Watch beautiful landscapes from all over the world !

programme.title: Martial Arts and meditation
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 2 - Martial Arts and meditation
programme.desc: Today, we will meet in Santa Monica in the hub of the last healthy trends. Val will make us discover Erewhon, the biggest organic and hipster supermarket in Los Angeles. She will then meet Troy, a guru of healthy consciousness, for an outdoor class that mixes martial arts and meditation. Then, on the legendary "Muscle Beach", the beach of all athletes, we will meet David, an action movie double, for a very aerial workout.

programme.title: Hotel Paseo, Palm Springs
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 2 - Hotel Paseo, Palm Springs
programme.desc: Val takes us to discover Palm Springs, the trendy and designer city in the heart of the California desert. In the heart of a private collection, we will discover all the flora of this region: an outdoor plant museum, one of the largest collections of cacti, and even tequila flowers. Then well head to the Paseo Hotel, one of the zen and design hotels of Palm Springs, where well meet the chef of the restaurant who will concoct his signature dishes. We will end our day with a relaxing massage with crystals.

programme.title: Carving a Halloween pumpkin
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My First Garden - Season 1 - Carving a Halloween pumpkin
programme.desc: We meet again in the market garden of Romainville, for a special Halloween episode. In one of our first episodes, we learned how to sow a pumpkin seed. The pumpkins, which I had installed in my vegetable garden, have grown well now that we are in autumn. And thats good because today were going to show you how to dig a pumpkin to make a beautiful Halloween lantern.

programme.title: Potato cutlets with vegetable puree
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Vegetarian Delights - Season 1 - Potato cutlets with vegetable puree
programme.desc: In this recipe, well prepare delicious potato cutlets accompanied by a creamy vegetable puree. This dish is perfect for a comforting and tasty vegetarian meal.

programme.title: Creamy cauliflower soup
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Vegetarian Delights - Season 1 - Creamy cauliflower soup
programme.desc: In this recipe, well prepare a creamy, comforting cauliflower and celeriac veloute. This mild, delicate soup is spiced up with condiments like paprika, garlic and oregano, and a touch of olive oil for an even more gourmet texture. An ideal dish for a light starter or a warming dinner.

programme.title: Paul John Elliott
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 2 - Paul John Elliott
programme.desc: Without really knowing why, Paul Elliott will change his life from cartoonist to massage therapist. Aspired by success, money, success, he will create several clinics and will eventually lose the human aspects and lose himself. A new turn, a new meeting and Paul will finally resume his dreams of painting. Follow Paul in his tumults and his happiness found.

programme.title: Annabelle Higgins and Valérie Sirois
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 2 - Annabelle Higgins and Valérie Sirois
programme.desc: They are beautiful sisters, they are passionate about nature and they have a very strong common point: entrepreneurship. After years of evolution in consumer sectors, discover Annabelle and Valerie who knew how to listen to their passion to create a fitness and surf club (for Annabelle) and a zero waste grocery store (for Valerie).

programme.title: Véronick Desmarais
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 2 - Véronick Desmarais
programme.desc: The everyday work is not always easy and it is sometimes difficult to get by. If there is one thing that Veronick has learned from her experience and those around her, it is because she is able to surpass that and to embark on her dreams and plans to become a massage therapist. You will believe in your abilities too.

programme.title: Violaine Courtois
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 2 - Violaine Courtois
programme.desc: Everything started from the dream of her parents, she becomes a veterinarian. In her career that she launched backwards, Violaine will meet people who will take her to a different path of life. The chance will be at the rendezvous but it is especially the courage to resume studies and create his company that will build his project. Follow the encounters and travels of Violaine that brought her to fasciatherapy and nonviolent communication.

programme.title: Nature’s Heroes: Gabon - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 3 - Nature’s Heroes: Gabon - Part 2
programme.desc: The incredible diversity of flora and fauna, the fight against climate change, the balance between growth and sustainable development: these are all battles being fought on five continents. Yann Arthus-Bertrand takes us on this expedition. Were off to Gabon to discover the Ivindo National Park and Port-Gentil, then on to Sri Lanka in Kandi. Back to Gabon we go to Libreville, then Lambarene to talk about turtles and the health of the local people. Finally, off to Dhaka-Bangladesh.

programme.title: Nature’s Heroes: Gabon - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 3 - Nature’s Heroes: Gabon - Part 1
programme.desc: How can we reconcile the development needed to sustain the lives of nearly seven billion people with the protection of the Earths natural resources? Yann Arthus-Bertrand and his team have chosen Gabon to continue their survey of the planet. Well be discovering the Kongou Falls, the Langoue clearing with their elephant in Gabon. Then in Colombia, we will go on the island of Malpelo with their shark. Back to Gabon we will discover the Minkebe National Park and the bats in Franceville. We will also go to India in Hyderabad, which has convinced farmers to use no pesticides and no GMOs in their cultivation.

programme.title: Citrus flavors
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - Citrus flavors
programme.desc: Julie takes you through the Pyrenees Orientales, then Corsica, before making a stop on the Côte dAzur, and concludes her journey between Rungis and Paris... all to explore the world of citrus fruits! These fruits add flavor, zest, and seasoning to any recipe, making them indispensable in the kitchen. They bring the warmth and sunshine of the South of France and the exoticism of distant lands. While were all familiar with lemons, clementines, and grapefruits, Julie introduces us to a thousand other varieties.

programme.title: Escape
programme.desc: Watch beautiful landscapes from all over the world !

programme.title: Topanga Canyon, AMBA Yoga
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 2 - Topanga Canyon, AMBA Yoga
programme.desc: Val goes to the heart of Topanga Canyon, California, a favorite spot for yoga addicts and nature lovers. Here she will experience AMBA Yoga, a kind of hollistic yoga for women. We will also attend a Sound Bowl session, a Tibetan practice considered the ultimate in meditation. In the heart of Venice Beach, we will discover the "Plant Lab", a new high-tech application that records the vibrations of plants to create music. Finally, Val will present us the largest concept store of rare crystals in South America.

programme.title: Hot Springs
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 2 - Hot Springs
programme.desc: Still in Palm Springs, we will discover the Parker Hotel, the most trendy and design hotel in town. A French chef will take us to cook in the middle of nature. Then, Val will go to Desert Springs, a town known for its natural hot springs. At one of the many spas in town, Val will test one of the springs and even attend a Sound Bowl session.

programme.title: Growing mushrooms at home
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My First Garden - Season 1 - Growing mushrooms at home
programme.desc: We meet at the Romainville market garden centre to learn how to grow mushrooms at home. Some varieties, such as button mushrooms, oyster mushrooms or shiitake mushrooms, grow quite easily in mushroom houses. But you too can do it. And today we will show you how to make a miniature version of this kit to grow oyster mushrooms at home.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Vegetarian Delights - Season 1 - Mashed potatoes with vegetable gravy
programme.desc: In this recipe, we prepare mashed potatoes in vegetable stock. The mashed potatoes are soft and melt-in-the-mouth, while the richly flavored broth of bell bell pepper, carrot, zucchini, celeriac and tomato enhances the whole.

programme.title: Sweet potato bruschetta
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Vegetarian Delights - Season 1 - Sweet potato bruschetta
programme.desc: In this recipe, we reinvent the classic bruschetta by replacing the bread with a roasted sweet potato base. Garnished with tomatoes, guacamole, chilli pepper and a drizzle of olive oil, this healthy and tasty bruschetta is perfect for an aperitif or a light starter.

programme.title: Carine (Nice)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Carine (Nice)
programme.desc: After twenty years as a lawyer, Carine decided to give in to her desire to help others heal. Her inner journey led her to discover a passion for naturopathy as she rediscovered her love for nature and learned the healing qualities of the plants around her. Combined with a deep understanding of astrology and nutrition, she is now able to help others live better and find their own path.

programme.title: Virginie (Lyon)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Virginie (Lyon)
programme.desc: Virginie’s beautiful handwritten lettering decorates the walls and windows of many shops in and around Lyon, France, as she lives out her passion of finding beauty in every stroke. A former waitress, Virginie was struggling to find her calling when she suffered a life-altering horse accident that almost left her handicapped. At only 30, she was forced to put her whole life into perspective. She finally found herself through a love for graphic design and lettering, combined with a desire for freedom that came with working independently. To motivate other women, she has also launched “Ladyboss”, a network of inspiring women entrepreneurs.

programme.title: Laetitia (French Alps)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Laetitia (French Alps)
programme.desc: While pregnant with her daughter, Laetitia, a former journalist, experienced a strong desire to change lifestyles and move to the countryside. Remembering the teachings of her grandmother, she began to venture outdoors into the surrounding Alps and study the different plants at her fingertips. Today she holds a wealth of knowledge about the medicinal and aromatherapeutic value of plants that she applies to making natural products. With utmost respect for the environment, Laetitia gathers only what she needs in order to make herbal infusions.

programme.title: Louise (Oleron Island)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Louise (Oleron Island)
programme.desc: At only 20 years old, Louise is full of confidence and already achieved a personal dream of hers to share her passion for nutritious and locally-sourced ingredients on the island of Oleron, France. Repurposing a camping car, she set up a brunch and tea-time spot where the guests can hand-pick their ingredients in the adjacent organic fields. Louise transforms the ingredients into favourite creations of hers and even joins her father for boat trips when she needs to stock up on fresh fish for the menu!

programme.title: Japan: Mass consumption - What the labels forget to mention - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 3 - Japan: Mass consumption - What the labels forget to mention - Part 1
programme.desc: In this instalment, Yann Arthus-Bertrand lifts the veil on the products people buy. Almost everything we buy has a direct impact on our environment. We head to Japan to talk about the impact of new technologies, then to the Republic of Congo in Bukavu for the coltan harvest. How does our total consumption affect the environment? What permanent brands are we imposing on our planet? How can we differentiate between useful and useless purchases?

programme.title: Japan: Mass consumption - What the labels forget to mention - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 3 - Japan: Mass consumption - What the labels forget to mention - Part 2
programme.desc: Above all, these reports are an opportunity for Yann Arthus-Bertrand to take stock of the planet and denounce certain human behaviors that are at the root of dramatic, even irreversible, environmental and climatic degradation. Off to Tokyo, then Kenya, to an animal sanctuary. Then on to Mount Fuji to learn how to live there, and all the plastic that clogs up the seas. Reports will focus on everyday products, chosen for their destructive production practices for both people and the environment.

programme.title: The taste of bread
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - The taste of bread
programme.desc: Today, Julie takes you on a bread trail to uncover the dedicated artisan bakers and millers. Her adventure will lead her through the Libourne region, then onwards to the North of France, the Ardèche, and the Aisne, where bakers have transformed bread into a powerful catalyst for social cohesion. While some individuals may avoid bread, particularly due to gluten-related concerns, others have chosen to reposition it at the forefront of the dining experience by championing its nutritional benefits. This commitment is shared by several chefs whom Julie will meet at the conclusion of her expedition.

programme.title: Escape
programme.desc: Watch beautiful landscapes from all over the world !

programme.title: Ojai Valley Lavender Festival
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Ojai Valley Lavender Festival
programme.desc: Val Kahl is in the heart of Ojai, the lavender town, where she takes a tour in Ojai Valley Lavender Festival and tastes drink, gluten-free cookies and organic cooking products made of lavender. She later found herself in the middle of lavender field while stopping by the Frog Creek Farm. After working out on the hot power yoga around palm trees in Caravan Outpost, she heads out to Gratitude Rock for an organic fresh juice tasting with an avocado ranch view.

programme.title: Japanese pagodas and Coconut Massage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 2 - Japanese pagodas and Coconut Massage
programme.desc: Val goes to Nicholas, a master of enlightenment, at his wellness ranch. Here, Val will try out some new high-tech relaxation sessions. She will then go to one of the zenest hotels in California, where she will participate in a yoga session in a Japanese pagoda, followed by a coconut massage. She will test a Cryo-Cafe, a new concept store that mixes coffee break and cryotherapy session. Finally, she will attend a Theremin session, a very special relaxation ceremony.

programme.title: Thinning seedlings
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My First Garden - Season 1 - Thinning seedlings
programme.desc: We meet in the market garden of Romainville to continue gardening together. In our previous episodes, we sowed chives and radishes. Today, were going to learn how to take good care of them. And as a bonus, well show you a great technique to easily get even more plants in your garden. Lets get started!

programme.title: Juliette (Morbihan)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Juliette (Morbihan)
programme.desc: Juliette has long been aware of the delicate beauty of nature. For years she spent her life on the sea, organising regattas for the traditional sailboats that are famous in the French region of Morbihan. Her appreciation for the elements made for a smooth transition as she decided to leave the water behind and return to the earth. Learning to shape a ball of clay into a graceful and elegant object, she discovered a passion for ceramics. Today, she lives from her creations and makes pieces that reflect their surroundings, the stunning Gulf of Morbihan.

programme.title: Anna (Brittany)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Anna (Brittany)
programme.desc: Anna’s unusual background provided inspiration for her life change. Her career began as a wolf trainer for cinema and it was during these years that she developed her deep love for animals. After being tired of seeing them used as props and constantly in cages, she decided to leave the world of show business behind and start an eco-friendly sheep and goat pasture. To further share her passion for these gentle animals, Anna has opened a conservatory farm where visitors can experience first-hand the joys of being close to nature. She also makes amazing goat cheese!

programme.title: Cristina (Spain)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Cristina (Spain)
programme.desc: At 31 years old, the last thing Cristina expected when she went to see the doctor about a blocked ear was to leave the consultation with a diagnosis for Breast Cancer. This young and passionate sociologist decided to apply the same philosophy to her treatment as she did when surfing: when a wave crashes down on you, get up and try again. Through her healing journey she deepened her love for the ocean and also discovered the therapeutic capabilities of yoga for cancer patients. Today she shares her practice through surf and yoga retreats and is specialised in oncological yoga, helping others heal.

programme.title: Idoia (Spain)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Idoia (Spain)
programme.desc: Idoia thrives on weaving together the sources of inspiration that surround her. Heavily influenced by the natural beauty of her home region of Galicia, Spain, she creates unique woven pieces from diverse and beautiful materials. Idoia’s pieces represent her vision of a modern woman, drawing from the traditions and experiences of those who perfected the craft before her and also pushing to innovate and adapt her creations for the modern world. Her recent collaboration with luxury fashion house Loewe is a dream come true for this modern artisan.

programme.title: Nature’s Heroes: Bangladesh - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 4 - Nature’s Heroes: Bangladesh - Part 1
programme.desc: With Bangladesh as a running thread, Yann Arthus-Bertrand meets several people who have changed their lives to dedicate themselves to a major project. In Bangladesh, Yves and Runa Marre have created the Friendship Foundation. Among other things, they’ve created a floating hospital installed on an old barge bought in France. Julie Andersen, an ex-advertising executive from New York has come to South Africa to defend sharks with her Shark Angels Foundation. In North India, Kartik Satyanarayan is helping to stop the dreadful exploitation of the lippus bears (dancing bears). He’s created Wildlife SOS, a preserve to rehabilitate the bears that have been rescued and to give work to the men of...

programme.title: USA: The end of oil - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 3 - USA: The end of oil - Part 1
programme.desc: "The end of oil" is the amazing story of a raw material which has revolutionized mans life in just a century. But today, oil reserves are depleting. In his crazy race for always more production, Man didnt manage to preserve this precious energy that took million years for the Earth to give out. To tell the adventure of oil, Yann Arthus-Bertrand and his team went to the United States, the country which depends the most on black gold. At the start of the 21st century, it is now urgent to realize that oil resources are limited. Its today that we have to act and get organized, in order to prepare the new era to come. While all our economies are based on the petrol barrels price, well...

programme.title: A la carte grills
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - A la carte grills
programme.desc: If youre a nature enthusiast and a fan of outdoor cooking, the upcoming season is perfect for barbecue enthusiasts! Our journey will take us to Aube, nestled in the heart of the Brevonnes forest, and then to the Massif des Bauges, where grilling and snow create a unique combination. Afterward, well explore the Libournais region, where well uncover cooking techniques that make use of vine shoots, which are plentiful in the area. Just a short distance from the vineyards, well arrive at another corner of Gironde, the Blaye region, where the cooking method remains consistent but features a distinctly local ingredient: eel.

programme.desc: Its in an episode full of surprise that we meet with Val Khal in the heart of Los Angeles for a visit to the new trendy wellbeing boutique Springs. This new concept store offers the opportunity to make Vinyasa yoga wearing a trendy outfit, treat yourself to a revitalizing juice detox before heading to a Cryotherapy session without leaving the venue! programme.title: Acro Yoga on a Skyscraper
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 2 - Acro Yoga on a Skyscraper
programme.desc: Val takes us to Los Angeles, on the roof of one of the most prestigious hotels in Beverly Hills for a session of acro yoga, aerial acrobatic yoga. Then, in the heart of Downtown, Val will experience a glass slide down one of the tallest towers in California. Shell also try SandBox Fitness, the trendy indoor surfing class, before trying Lazerfit, a new way to work out that combines warm-up, stretching and laser tag.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #37: Freestyle Pro Tour 2025 - Paros (GRE)
programme.desc: The Freestyle Pro Tour 2025 stops off at the beautiful island of Paros in Greece. Crystal clear water, steady meltemi winds, and the breathtaking backdrop of the Aegean Sea set the stage for the worlds best freestyle windsurfers.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #45: Freestyle Pro Tour 2024
programme.desc: Welcome to World of Freesports and the Freestyle Pro Tour 2024! Get ready to witness the world’s best freestylers perform jaw-dropping tricks and intense competition on the water. Let the battle for the title begin - it’s time for freestyle action!

programme.title: WOF 2024 #37: GKA Kitesurf Worldtour Sylt Highlights
programme.desc: GKA Kitesurf Worldtour Sylt Highlights - Sylt (GER)Welcome to World of Freesports and the beautiful beaches of Sylt, the most northern part of Germany, where the Big Air Riders of the GKA are off for a battle. Let´s check out this spectaculare water event!

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Prologue Day
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.title: Tortour 2017 (SUI) and Mountain Festival (ESP)
programme.desc: The incredible landscapes of the Parc National DAiguestortes i Estany de Sant Maurici as well as the magical settings of La Vall de Boí have been the chosen venue for the celebration, of the first edition of BUFF® MOUNTAIN VALL DE BOI FESTIVAL.

programme.title: Transmaurienne Vanoise - MTB Stage Race (FRA)
programme.desc: The worlds biggest cycling area hosts one of the most beautiful mountain bike races in the world, and of course its right here in the French Alps, in the Haute Maurienne/Vanoise region. It is the incredible Transmaurienne 2017!

programme.title: Ötztaler Radmarathon - Cycle Marathon - Solden (AUT)
programme.desc: 4 steep Alpine passes, 238 kilometres in distance, and 5,500 metres in altitude: on August 27, 2017, nearly 5,000 competitors from all over the world will tackle the Oetztaler Radmarathon at Soelden, Tirol, Austria.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Sal (CPV)
programme.desc: Cape Verde hosts the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, bringing together the world’s best kite-surfers. Athletes from around the globe compete for the title, showcasing impressive skills in wave-riding and strapless freestyle.

programme.title: Visit Qatar GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 - Fuwairit (QAT)
programme.desc: Fuwairit Beach is the venue for the Visit Qatar GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024, where the worlds best freestyle kiteboarders put their skills to the test. With constant wind, this hotspot in Qatar offers the perfect conditions for the competitions.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup - Sal (CPV)
programme.desc: Sal is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the best wingfoilers in the world will meet for an exciting competition. This paradise in Cape Verde is known for its strong winds and rolling Atlantic waves.

programme.title: Copa Kitely GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 - Ibiraquera (BRA)
programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the worlds best wingfoilers will meet. With its constant winds and breathtaking coastline, this Brazilian hotspot provides the perfect backdrop for exciting races.

programme.title: Open Faces 2025 - FWQ Challenger Silvretta Montafon - Live delayed Part 1
programme.desc: For the first time, Silvretta Montafon will be part of the Freeride World Tour Challenger Series, making it a crucial contest for the worlds best qualifier riders who want to qualify for the Freeride World Tour 2026.

programme.title: Roc d’Azur 2024
programme.desc: With the aim of bringing cycling to as many people as possible in France, CIC has become a title partner of the Roc dAzur, Europes leading mountain bike event, which attracts almost 100,000 enthusiasts, participants and aficionados every year!

programme.title: E-Bike World Tour 2024
programme.desc: The Verbier E-Bike Festival, held in Verbier, Switzerland, from August 14-18, 2024, is Europes premier e-mountain biking event, attracting thousands of participants and spectators. In its sixth edition, the festival features a diverse range of activities.

programme.title: WES - World E-Bike Series, UCI E-Mountainbike World Cup Cross Country, Race 3 and 4 - Germany
programme.desc: Welcome to WES rounds 3 and 4 of the UCI E-Mountainbike Cross-Country World Cup presented by Schwalbe. We are in Bielstein, Germany, for the second year in a row and the Bielstein Forest Course is the venue for this event and one of Europes oldest motocross circuits.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2020 - #4 Austria
programme.desc: The third part of the FWT 2020 will take place in Austria. The Freeride World Tour is a worldwide competition of freeride snowboarding and skiing, where the best riders in the world compete against each other.

programme.title: Winter Games 2017 - Freeride Ski and Snowboard - New Zealand
programme.desc: Stunning scenery, world’s best talent and Kiwi hospitality is set to be showcased to a global audience with Winter Games New Zealand revealing its most diverse event yet. Winter Olympic, Paralympic and X Games stars are heading to New Zealand once again.

programme.title: Acro Games - Paragliding Aerobatics - Organya (ESP) and Rock Master Festival - Bouldering - Arco (ITA)
programme.desc: Organya is a very special place for this kind of flying and enables the pilots to basically do these tricks. They climb up and go down and that´s why it is called the magic mountain.

programme.desc: The GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 will take place in Dakhla. This Moroccan hotspot is known for its constant winds and breathtaking lagoon and offers perfect conditions for exciting freestyle performances.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 – Ibiraquera (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the worlds best wingfoilers will meet. With its constant winds and breathtaking coastline, this Brazilian hotspot provides the perfect backdrop for exciting races.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024 – Jericoacoara (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour will electrify the coast of Jericoacoara, Brazil, with competitions in its three big air divisions - TwinTip, Hydrofoil and Surfboard. A total of 57 athletes will be competing for the world championship titles at the premiere.

programme.title: Red Bull Romaniacs 2023 - Sibiu (ROU) - 150min LIVEmaniacs Summary

programme.desc: The Freestyle Pro Tour 2025 stops off at the beautiful island of Paros in Greece. Crystal clear water, steady meltemi winds, and the breathtaking backdrop of the Aegean Sea set the stage for the worlds best freestyle windsurfers.

programme.title: Open Faces 2025 - FWQ Challenger Silvretta Montafon - Live delayed Part 2
programme.desc: For the first time, Silvretta Montafon will be part of the Freeride World Tour Challenger Series, making it a crucial contest for the worlds best qualifier riders who want to qualify for the Freeride World Tour 2026.

programme.title: WES - World E-Bike Series, UCI E-Mountainbike World Cup Cross Country, Race 5 and 6 - Belgium
programme.desc: Welcome to WES World E-Bike Series Round 5 and 6. We are at Spa-Francorchamps, in Belgium, the iconic circuit, for this event presented by EICMA. The UCI E-Mountain Bike Cross-Country World Cup comes to the spectacular woods of this world-famous venue for the third year

programme.title: WES - World E-Bike Series, UCI E-Mountainbike World Cup Cross Country, Race 7 and 8 - Monaco
programme.desc: Hello and welcome to WES World E-Bike Series Round 7 and 8. For the first time since 2019, the Monaco - Alpes-Maritimes Round will welcome the Season Finale, this time with a brand new track in the French area of Turini, and the much awaited awards ceremony.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2021 - Prolog
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the worlds premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.desc: Swissway to Heaven is a film about multi-pitch climbing in the swiss alps.The dokumentary portraits the history and evolution of climbing in Swizerland aswell as Cedric Lachats adventure climbing all 5 big walls of the swiss alps.

programme.title: Simple Session 2024 - BMX Final
programme.desc: Simple Session was born in 2000, starting as a small-town competition, it has now blossomed into one of the worlds largest and most prestigious BMX and skateboarding contests. Simple Session 24 is set on August 24-25, promising a spectacular festival!

programme.title: WOF 2023 #36: SPAR Swiss Epic 2023
programme.desc: Vom 15. bis 19. August kampfen Zweierteams im malerischen Graubunden um den Gesamtsieg und wichtige UCI-Mountainbike-Punkte beim Swiss Epic. Mit mehr als 350km und fast 12.000 Hohenmetern wird den besten Mountainbikern alles abverlangt.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #37: ITF Beach Tennis World Tour 2023 - Sand Series Saarlouis Classic (GER)
programme.desc: Die Sand Series kehrt noch in diesem Monat an den Ort zuruck, an dem alles begann: nach Saarlouis, wo die Serie 2021 erstmals stattfand. Der ehemalige Weltranglistenerste Michele Cappelletti wird zum ersten Mal mit Andre Baran antreten.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #38: WES E-Bike World Series Round #3 and #4
programme.desc: In der heutigen Episode reisen wir nach Italien und Belgien zu Runde 3 und 4 der World E-Bike Series. Die weltbesten Mountainbikerinnen und Mountainbiker werden darum kampfen, wer in der Mitte des Rennkalenders die Fuhrung ubernimmt.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #39: FIA Karting European Championships
programme.desc: In der heutigen Episode besuchen wir die zukunftigen Formular 1 Stars bei der FIA Karting Europameisterschaft 2023 in Cremona, Italien. Schnallen Sie sich an und starten Sie Ihre Motoren, denn wir werden gleich auf Platz 1 fahren.

programme.title: Swatch Catch The Moment - Profile Kassia Meador
programme.desc: "Catch the Moment" profiles athletes from around the world, including American longboard surfer Kassia Meador. Kassia is constantly exploring new creative endeavors and travels the world for surfing and photography trips.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #1 Ordino Arcalís (AND)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Freeride World Tour 2021 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: The worlds best freeriders will compete again at this years Freeride World Tour. The first stop takes place in Ordino Arcalís, Andorra on the February 19th. The Andorran Pyrenees offers an amazing variety of terrain and venues that could host the competition.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #1 Ordino Arcalís (AND)

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup and GWA Wingfoil World Cup - Dakhla (MAR)
programme.desc: The GKA Kite-Surf World Cup and the GWA Wingfoil World Cup in Dakhla, Morocco, bring together the best kite surfers and wingfoilers in the world. The riders show off their technical skills and innovation in the wave riding disciplines.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf and Hydrofoil Big Air World Cup - Sylt (GER)
programme.desc: Sylt is the venue for the GKA Kite-Surf and Hydrofoil Big Air World Cup 2024, which brings together the best riders in the world. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the title and show impressive skills in wave riding and big air hydrofoiling.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #19: Pasko the Magic Move
programme.desc: Recovering from testicular cancer, professional athlete and filmmaker Maarten Molenaar embarks on a journey to Fuerteventura to learn a new freestyle windsurfing trick - the Pasko.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #09: SSL Gold Cup
programme.desc: Final Series 2023 - World Class Sailing - SSL Gold Cup 2023Der SSL Gold Cup ist eine spannende Ausscheidungsserie und wird auf den Kanarischen Inseln ausgetragen. Die 24 besten Nationen der SSL-Rangliste und 16 Nationen aus der Qualifikationsserie nehmen daran teil.

programme.title: Mammut Athlete Profile Dani Arnold - The Art of Iceclimbing
programme.desc: Daniel Arnold was born in 1984 in the Swiss canton of Uri and grew up in the small mountain village of Biel in the heart of the Swiss Alps. Dani and his brother experience all aspects of mountain life: hiking, skiing and climbing in some of the toughest climbing locations in the world

programme.title: Profile Marcel Remy - On top of Miroir de l´Argentine
programme.desc: It is his favorite route: the 450 meter north-west face of the famous Miroir de l’Argentine. For more than the 200th time, Marcel Remy, father of Yves and Claude Remy, climbs this classic peak with his sons on August 22, 2017. At the age of 94.

programme.title: Legendary Fisherman, Part 1
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the sea duelist Mako Tsunami and his bevy of underwater beasts! If Joey wins, he’ll have all six Locator Cards necessary to enter the Battle City Finals, but if he loses, he can kiss the finals goodbye! However, little does Joey realize that he has bigger problems than this duel; the Rare Hunters are closing in on his location…

programme.title: Legendary Fisherman, Part 2
programme.desc: Mako’s oceanic warrior The Legendary Fisherman unleashes a wave of destruction by stealthily destroying Joey’s monsters from the depths of the sea! Joey has to put his skills, training and experience to the ultimate test before he’s all washed out!

programme.title: Double Duel, Part 1: Yugi and Kaiba Vs. Lumis and Umbra
programme.desc: Abductions abound! Marik, with the help of Bakura, kidnaps Joey and Tea! To make matters worse, the Rare Hunters also kidnap Mokuba to force Yugi and Kaiba to take on tag team duelists Umbra and Lumis on top of a skyscraper! The losers will be sent plummeting into the Shadow Realm!

programme.title: Double Duel, Part 2: Yugi and Kaiba Vs. Lumis and Umbra
programme.desc: Lumis and Umbra systematically dismantle Yugi and Kaiba’s tumultuous teamwork! Can Yugi and Kaiba learn to put their differences aside before they’re sent on a one-way trip into the Shadow Realm?

programme.title: Double Duel, Part 3: Yugi and Kaiba Vs. Lumis and Umbra
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba start to exhibit signs of teamwork, but it’s too little too late when Umbra and Lumis summon Masked Beast Des Gardius, a monstrous menace even more powerful than Blue-Eyes White Dragon!

programme.title: Double Duel, Part 4: Yugi and Kaiba Vs. Lumis and Umbra
programme.desc: Yugi combines his magnetic monsters into the polar powerhouse Valkyrion the Magna Warrior! However, little does Yugi know that Umbra and Lumis have one final mask to turn Yugi’s monsters against him…

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba are on a rescue mission to save their friends! But along the way, all their worries and secrets are revealed as they relive the troubles they’ve faced… and will be facing in the future!

programme.title: Friends Til the End, Part 1
programme.desc: It’s friend vs. friend as Marik mind controls Joey to duel against Yugi! The loser will be dragged into the ocean to sleep with the fishes! Can Yugi break Joey out of his spell, or will Joey break Yugi?

programme.title: Friends Til the End, Part 2
programme.desc: Though Joey decimates Yugi’s life points, Yugi can’t bring himself to attack his dear friend! Yugi summons Joey’s favorite monster Red-Eyes B. Dragon to try to bring Joey back to his senses. Will seeing his favorite card help Joey break Marik’s spell, or is Yugi’s last ditch effort a lost cause?

programme.title: Friends Til the End, Part 3
programme.desc: Yugi starts to break Marik’s spell over Joey, but he now must duel without the Millennium Puzzle! When Joey draws the card he needs to decimate Yugi’s life points, what chance does Yugi have, especially on his own?

programme.title: Friends Til the End, Part 4
programme.desc: There’s only one minute left in the duel before the loser is sent plummeting to the depths of the sea! Will these best friends actually send each other to their doom? However, there may be a special savior who just regained her eyesight…

programme.title: Shadow of a Duel
programme.desc: It’s the battle of the ghouls as Bakura unleashes his army of ghosts against Bonz’s zealous zombies for the right to enter the Battle City Finals! But for whom will the final bell toll when this duel is played in the Shadow Realm…

programme.title: Lights, Camera, Duel
programme.desc: It’s the game of love as Hollywood heartthrob Jean-Claude Magnum challenges Mai to a duel in order to win her hand in marriage! Will Mai succumb to Jean-Claude’s charm, not to mention his cadre of ninja monsters, or will she send him packing back to Tinseltown?

programme.title: Let the Finals Begin!
programme.desc: Let the Battle City Finals begin! The eight finalists will have their skill and endurance put to the ultimate test in a dueling arena thousands of feet in the sky! Yugi and friends finally meet the other finalists, but none of them are who they appear to be…

programme.title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura, Part 1
programme.desc: It’s the first duel of the Battle City Finals as Yugi squares off against the evil spirit of the Millennium Ring thats possessing Bakura! Yugi quickly dispatches Bakura’s grotesque ghouls, but Bakura has a sinister strategy straight from the graveyard…

programme.title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura, Part 2
programme.desc: Bakura activates Destiny Board, which will cause Yugi to lose automatically in five turns! If that’s not bad enough, Bakura’s Dark Sanctuary damages Yugi’s life points every time Yugi attacks! Unable to attack and running out of time, Yugi’s trapped!

programme.title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura, Part 3
programme.desc: Yugi’s Slifer the Sky Dragon is about to unleash the final blow to win the duel, but Bakura may not survive the blast from the almighty Egyptian God Monster! Will Yugi attack and advance in the finals, or will he surrender to save Bakura’s life but lose the only chance to protect the world from Marik’s evil?

programme.title: Rage of the Egyptian Gods
programme.desc: The origin of the Egyptian God Cards is finally revealed! The mysterious Shadi takes Yugi on a journey back in time to the creation of Duel Monsters… and the dangerous powers it released!

programme.title: Awakening of Evil, Part 1
programme.desc: In the second duel of the Battle City Finals, Odion, disguised as Marik, befuddles Joey with numerous traps to bring the duel to a stalemate. However, Joey has Giant Trunade, the perfect counter to Odion’s strategy that guarantees Joey victory… or is Joey falling into another trap?

programme.title: Awakening of Evil, Part 2
programme.desc: Odion’s Embodiments of Apophis run roughshod over Joey’s monsters… and his life points! Can Joey effectively utilize the monsters he won earlier in the tournament, or is he already too flustered to mount a successful counterattack?

programme.title: Awakening of Evil, Part 3
programme.desc: It’s a feeding frenzy as Odion’s Serket devours Joey’s monsters to morph into greater and powerful stages of evolution! How can Joey defeat Serket when it ingests Joey’s monsters whenever they’re summoned on to the field?

programme.title: Awakening of Evil, Part 4
programme.desc: Odion uses a phony Egyptian God Card to summon the third Egyptian God Monster The Winged Dragon of Ra and targets it to annihilate the rest of Joey’s life points! However, is Odion able to control the ultimate power of an Egyptian God, or will The Winged Dragon of Ra punish all those unworthy of summoning it?

programme.title: Mind Game: Mai Vs. Marik, Part 1
programme.desc: The third duel of the Battle City Finals between Mai and Marik is no ordinary duel; it’s a battle in the dreaded Shadow Realm where losing life points equals losing your memories! As Marik’s true sinister self comes to the surface, does Mai stand a chance against this malevolent evil?

programme.title: Mind Game: Mai Vs. Marik, Part 2
programme.desc: As Mai loses more and more of her memories under Marik’s relentless assault, she loses confidence in her dueling abilities. Will Yugi and friends’ neverending support bring her back to victory, or will her shattered mind be trapped in the Shadow Realm for eternity?

programme.title: Mind Game: Mai Vs. Marik, Part 3
programme.desc: Mai gains control of Marik’s The Winged Dragon of Ra, but she’s unable to decipher how to unleash its massively powerful abilities! Can Mai solve the mystery of the Egyptian God Card before Marik solves it himself and incinerates Mai with the full fury of The Winged Dragon of Ra?

programme.title: A Duel With Destiny: Kaiba Vs. Ishizu, Part 1
programme.desc: In the fourth duel of the Battle City Finals, Kaiba’s mystery opponent is… Ishizu! With the power of her Millennium Necklace, Ishizu can see the future, including every card Kaiba is planning to play! Does Kaiba stand a chance against an opponent who knows his moves even before he does?

programme.title: A Duel With Destiny: Kaiba Vs. Ishizu, Part 2
programme.desc: Ishizu, using the magic of her Millennium Necklace, has already seen the outcome of the duel – she will defeat Kaiba with her trap! How can Kaiba win when it’s already destined that he will lose? It’s time for Kaiba to change the future!

programme.title: The Tomb-Keepers Secret
programme.desc: As Marik’s evil grows, Ishizu reveals the secrets of her bloodline: How did Marik transform from a kind child into a power-hungry tyrant out for world domination? Can Yugi save Marik from the edge of darkness, or is he already beyond salvation?

programme.title: Showdown in the Shadows: Marik Vs. Bakura, Part 1
programme.desc: With their previous pact broken, Bakura duels Marik for the right to control the Millennium Rod and the Millennium Ring, and the loser will be trapped inside the Shadow Realm forever! To tip the odds, Bakura gains an unexpected ally in the form of… another Marik?

programme.title: Showdown in the Shadows: Marik Vs. Bakura, Part 2
programme.desc: Bakura and good Marik summon The Winged Dragon of Ra, ready to blast and banish evil Marik into the Shadow Realm! But The Winged Dragon of Ra has more than one special ability, and evil Marik knows how to use them all!

programme.title: Ein virtueller Alptraum
programme.desc: Die restlichen Teilnehmer des City Battle Turniers sind im Luftschiff unterwegs zur Kaiba Corporation Insel: dem Austragungsort des Finales. Kurz bevor sie eintreffen, wird das Luftschiff entfuhrt. Dort begegnet Kaiba Noah einem jungen Duellanten, der anscheinend noch eine Rechnung mit ihm offen hat.

programme.title: Gefangen im Cyberspace (1)
programme.desc: Die funf ehemaligen Manager von Kaiba Corporation schicken alle Duellanten in einzelne Cyberraume. Hier wollen sie gegen Yugi und Co. im Duell antreten. Wenn sie gewinnen, werden sie aus dem virtuellen Gefangnis befreit und die jungen Duellanten mussten sich dort einsperren lassen. Das erste Duell bestreiten Yugi und Ganzley. Da Yugi die Regeln noch nicht beherrscht, kommt er schnell ins Hintertreffen. Wird er es schaffen?

programme.title: Gefangen im Cyberspace (2)
programme.desc: Yugi setzt sein Duell gegen Gansley fort. Da sich der abgebruhte Geschaftsmann viel besser mit den Regeln des neuen Spiels auskennt, kommt Yugi sehr in Bedrangnis. Schon zwei mal wurde sein Angriff reflektiert und hat ihn dann selber getroffen. Ein drittes Mal wurde das Ende bedeuten, und Yugi musste fur immer im Cyberraum bleiben. Duke und Tristan konnen aus dem endloslangen Gang ausbrechen und retten im letzten Augenblick Serenity vor einem wild gewordenen Monster.

programme.title: Gefangen im Cyberspace (3)
programme.desc: Fur Yugi geht das Duell mit Gansley in die dritte Runde. Er muss sehr vorsichtig sein, denn einen dritten direkten Angriff wurde er nicht uberstehen. Als Gansley zum vernichtenden Schlag ansetzen will, kommt ihm Kuriboh zu Hilfe. Yugi nutzt die allgemeine Verwirrung, setzt zum Gegenschlag an und vernichtet Gansley. Tea kann ihren blauen, einaugigen Verfolgern entkommen. Aber hat sie sie wirklich fur immer abgeschuttelt?

programme.title: Eisduell (1)
programme.desc: Tea trifft den Pinguin wieder, der sie vor den einaugigen Monstern gerettet hat. Er fuhrt sie in einen groSSen Eispalast. Dort trifft sie auf Crump, der nun die Gestalt eines Pinguins angenommen hat. Weil er Teas Korper ubernehmen will, fordert er sie zum Duell in der Eis-Arena heraus. Tea friert sehr stark und kann sich kaum auf das Spiel konzentrieren. Yugi kann horen, wie Tea in der Kalte leidet. Aber da er keinen Ausgang aus seinem Labyrinth findet, kann er ihr nicht zu Hilfe eilen.

programme.title: Eisduell (2)
programme.desc: Tea duelliert sich weiter mit Crump, dessen Geist in der virtuellen Welt die Gestalt eines Pinguins angenommen hat. Mit geschickt vorher berechneten Zugen bringt er Tea zunehmend in Bedrangnis.

programme.title: Angeklagt (1)
programme.desc: Nachdem die ersten beiden der Big Five im Duell gegen Yugi und Tea gescheitert sind, erhalt nun Johnson von Noah eine letzte Chance. Er soll gegen Joey antreten. Joey nimmt das Duell gegen den ehemaligen Hausanwalt der Kaiba Corporation anfangs auf die leichte Schulter. Er muss aber bald einsehen, dass dieser mit allen Wassern gewaschen ist und seine ausgefeilte Strategie eine echte Gefahr fur Joey darstellt. Yugi und Tea erreichen nach einer langen Wanderung durch die Eiswuste endlich den warmenden Gerichtssaal in dem der Kampf zwischen Joey und Johnson stattfindet. Werden sie ihren alten Freund aus seiner verzwickten Lage befreien konnen?

programme.title: Angeklagt (2)
programme.desc: Joeys Chancen im Duell gegen Johnson werden immer schlechter. Er verliert einen Zug nach dem anderen. Und das teilweise aus vollig unerklarbaren Grunden. Da taucht Noah im Gerichtssaal auf und will das Duell abbrechen, weil Johnson wiederholt geschummelt hat. Joey will aber, dass das Duell – jetzt unter fairen Bedingungen – zu Ende gebracht wird. Mit der Zauberkarte ‚Schwere Entscheidung‘ gelingt es ihm, den Juristen auszutricksen und die Partie fur sich zu entscheiden. Aber dann erfahrt er, dass sich auch seine Schwester Serenity duellieren soll. Wird er sie rechtzeitig finden, damit er ihr helfen kann?

programme.title: Maschineninvasion (1)
programme.desc: Serenity, Duke und Tristan entdecken eine geheimnisvolle Tur durch die sie in eine groSSe Lagerhalle geraten. Dort begegnet ihnen plotzlich Nesbitt, der vierte der Big Five. Er fordert Serenity zum Duell heraus. Bekanntlich verfugt sie uber keine Duellerfahrung. Deshalb bieten Tristan und Duke an, sich an ihrer Stelle mit Nesbitt zu duellieren. Der ehemalige Vizeprasident fur neue Technologien lehnt ab. Schlimmer noch: Er will jetzt gegen alle drei kampfen. Serenity macht am laufenden Band Fehler. Immer wieder mussen Tristan und Duke sie retten. Dabei verliert Tristan seinen Deck Master. Die Big Five durfen also seinen Korper ubernehmen. Kann Duke das noch verhindern?

programme.title: Maschineninvasion (2)
programme.desc: Das Duell zwischen Duke, Serenity und Nesbitt geht weiter. Mit ein paar Tricks aus seinem Dungeon-Dice-Monsters-Spiel gelingt es Duke, Nesbitt kurzfristig zu verunsichern. Aber als Serenity am Zug ist, sieht es wieder schlecht aus fur die beiden. Plotzlich tauchen Joey, Yugi und Tea am Duellfeldrand auf. Sie machen Serenity Mut. Sie erinnert sich an die Lektion, die ihr Tristan in Sachen Duel Monsters vor einiger Zeit erteilt hat und macht ein paar schlaue Zuge. Duke aktiviert die Zauberkarte, die von Tristan zuruckgelassen wurde. Er kann Nesbitts Lebenspunkte komplett vernichten. Obwohl der vierte der Big Five damit verloren hat, bleibt Tristans Korper verschwunden.

programme.title: An Imperfect Couple - Part 2
programme.desc: Being Anna’s boyfriend is a dangerous job, but when Anna’s teacher plays a Barian card, Yuma finds out just how dangerous it is!

programme.title: Enter Vector
programme.desc: Yuma is confronted by an enemy from the past who casts a dark shadow on his future!

programme.title: The Search for Shadows
programme.desc: Yuma embarks on a dangerous mission to rescue Ray from the evil clutches of Vector!

programme.title: Shadows of Deception
programme.desc: The Barians are on the attack, and Yuma is ready to risk everything to rescue Ray! But when Vector reveals a terrifying truth, Yumas dream of saving Ray turns into a nightmare!

programme.title: Sinister Shadows
programme.desc: Still reeling from Vector’s revelation that he and Ray Shadows are one and the same, Yuma looks to make Vector pay for all his lies! But with Astral learning of Yuma’s own deceptions, will Yuma have to face Vector alone?

programme.title: Shadows End
programme.desc: All the cards are on the table! Can our heroes defeat the dark and dangerous Barians, or will they end up one card short?

programme.title: A Duel in Ruins: Part 1
programme.desc: An ancient Barian deity awakens to add a terrifying new twist to Barian World’s agenda against Astral!

programme.title: A Duel in Ruins: Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma is put to the ultimate test when a Number Guardian traps his friends and forces him to battle for their freedom!

programme.title: The Dark Mist Rises: Part 1
programme.desc: Yuma searches for the second Mythyrian Number and ends up finding an old nemesis who is out for revenge!

programme.title: The Dark Mist Rises: Part 2
programme.desc: Every time Astral attacks, he puts Yuma’s life in danger, but if he doesn’t attack, he’s a goner himself! It’s a no-win situation in the cruelest duel yet!

programme.title: Barian Vengeance: Part 1
programme.desc: Alito’s back in the ring to take down Yuma, but a fair fight isn’t in the cards when Alito has one of Yuma’s friends in his corner!

programme.title: Barian Vengeance: Part 2
programme.desc: Nistro’s under Alito’s control, and it’s up to Yuma and Dextra to free him! Can this tag team duo bob and weave their way past Alito’s attacks, or will this Barian knock out any chances they have of winning?

programme.title: Gefangen im Cyberspace (1)
programme.desc: Die funf ehemaligen Manager von Kaiba Corporation schicken alle Duellanten in einzelne Cyberraume. Hier wollen sie gegen Yugi und Co. im Duell antreten. Wenn sie gewinnen, werden sie aus dem virtuellen Gefangnis befreit und die jungen Duellanten mussten sich dort einsperren lassen. Das erste Duell bestreiten Yugi und Ganzley. Da Yugi die Regeln noch nicht beherrscht, kommt er schnell ins Hintertreffen. Wird er es schaffen?
